reviews.comments: Thanks for everything

One of those 'exceeded expectations' visits. Comfortable rooms, good location, not loud at night and very responsive host, who was always very quick to answer questions and fix any issues. It was the first time my entire family was in Israel for at least 10 years, and Irit and her apartment helped make it a pleasant experience.
Irit (the host) was super responsive and helpful.

Irits apartment is a fine shelter, when staying in Haifa for some days.
The apartment is equipped, so you can make your own food, and don't have to go to restaurants all the time.
The 3 bedrooms was good for us, but I will recommend Irit to invest in a new key to the toilet - we managed to get around, using knocking-signs before entering.
The free WI-FI works very fine.

We stayed in the apartment for ten days, a family of four, with small kids. The place is nice and include many appliances such as dishwasher, washing machine and air conditioning in each room. There is private parking.
Irit was in contact with us throughout our visit checking in with us that all is as it should be.
We enjoyed our visit, and can recommend Irits place with all our hearts.
nothing to complain, very good reception of Irit, kind and reactive.
Wonderful host, very caring and kind.  The apartment is in excellent condition and fully equipped.  Highly recommended
Great Location, great service. Thank you very much irit.

It was perfect.
Thank you Irit

Irit's apt is fantastic, clean, fully renovated, spacious. It's very close to restaurants and coffee shops, and the beach is a few minutes drive from the apt. Irit is a gracious host, the apt was well stocked with sheets, towels, kitchen appliances, all in working order. she even left games for the kids.
We all had a great time and we will definitely go back again.
Brilliant apartment, lovely host. Third floor walk up. Clean and spacious. Highly recommended.
apartamento muy amplio y limpio , la dueña muy atenta y servicial

נהנינו מאוד משבוע בדירה של עירית. מזגנים נהדרים, מטבח מצוייד היטב ועירית אפילו השאירה לנו חלב והפתעות לילדים. המיקום מצוין, בעיקר למי שרוצה לנסוע צפונה. חוף הים החמוד במרחק של כמה דקות נסיעה. הילדים שמחו לגלות את ארון המשחקים ואת הכלים לים.התקשורת עם עירית היתה קלה ונעימה וההמלצות שלה לבילויים היו מעולות.
בעלת הדירה מאוד אדיבה, חושבת על כל הפרטים, השאירה כל מיני פינוקים לילדים, הדירה קרובה לים,ולמרכזי קניות, הדירה נקייה מאוד ומצויידת בכלי מטבח וכלי בית בשפע.
אירוח נהדר. מיקום מצויין למשפחות עם ילדים
Emplacement correct avec un véhicule mais stationnement difficile.Commerces à (Website hidden by Airbnb) situé à 12km du centre.

Irit est très accueillante. Elle vous donne beaucoup de conseils pour visiter Haïfa et sa région. Son appartement est propre fonctionnel et situé dans un quartier calme.
Adresse à recommander sans hésitation.

Je recommande sans aucune réserve le logement proposé par Irit.
Il est bien situé et permet de découvrir avec facilité Haïfa, le Nord d'Israël, et la Galilée occidentale.
Situé au calme d'un quartier agréable avec magasins, restauration rapide, parking,
cet appartement refait à neuf et avec goût dispose de tout ce qui est nécessaire pour accueillir agréablement des hôtes de passage. Tout le confort est là: équipement de cuisine suffisant, excellente literie, sanitaires parfaits, propreté impeccable.
De belles baies protégées du soleil par un système efficace donnent une grande luminosité à cet espace moderne, décoré avec goût.
Au retour des visites, vous pourrez récupérer de votre fatigue dans de très bonnes conditions.
Irit est une excellente hôtesse: elle sait donner de très bons conseils aux voyageurs qu'elle héberge. Rien ne manque ici pour que votre séjour soit réussi.

reviews.comments: This is an authentic home, and not only a house, or another AirBnB. The house has a soul that comes together with the view and the fair wind from the sea. Fadi was a good host, very accommodating and quick to respond. I was there with my wife and children and we all enjoyed very much.

Fadi is the great host and the apartment is really cool! Very large, huge terrace, great view - we were really amazed. The important thing is that the apartment suits for families with the kids, it is full of toys, games, constructors. The flat is fully equipped with all that you need. Highly recommended for stay:)
Anything that I didn’t expect, was a good surprise :) I hope I can come back one day.
The view and the space are great for our family

The house is absolutely lovely and the backyard is fantastic with an incredible view. My 3 year old son was thrilled by all the games and toys in the house, and we enjoyed all the sports gear in the backyard, doing yoga while looking at the sea and enjoying amazing sunsets with a beer in the evening.  It was the perfect family vacation! I absolutely recommend staying there!

description: Для гостей и туристов Израиля, А так же для новых репатреантов, желающих снять временное жилье в пещой доступности до побережья средезимного моря в городе Хайфа.Большая двух комнатная квартира, гостиничного типа. Каждая комната с закрытым балконом оборудованная всем необходимым для жилья. Общая кухня, двойной санузел. Первый этаж! Квартира сдается по отдельной комнате а так же и полноценно. Каждая комната вмещает в себя 3 спальных места и одно детское до 3 лет.The spaceКаждая комната оборудованна отдельным минни холодильником, кофеварка, а так же имеется общая кухня с индукционной плитой. Общий двойной санузел, большая душевая.
additional_house_rules:
При заселении в апартаменты гость должен предоставить полное удостоверение личности с номером удостоверения личности, Для регистрации  бронирования.
Для граждан Израиля вздымается дополнительно НДС на всю сумму бронирования при заселении в объект.
Запрещено курить в помещении!
transit: Большой выбор трантспорта в любую точку прибытия: Междугородний поезд, автобусы, такси, митронит

reviews.comments: Квартира правда очень хорошая!

Отличное расположение по отношению к морю, больнице Рамбам, торговым точкам и к станции электрички. Все это в пешей доступности. Единственный недостаток, который можно назвать временным - это большая стройка от которой исходит много загрязнения для всех близлежащих районов. Но, на мой взгляд, эта стройка уже на этапах завершения.
reviews.response:
Расположение квартиры действительно удобное , в нескольких минутах ходьбы от моря, до больницы Рамбам, рядом с магазинами и разными другими инфраструктурами, фруктовые базарчики, обменник, кафе, аптека. транспортная развязка, междугородний поезд, детские площадки и исторические места.
Наличие застройки новых домов находится в отдалении от апартаментов и не доставляет не каких не удобств для проживания.
Уютные новое апартаменты, после ремонта. Квартира в идеально чистом состоянии! Каждая комната оборудована всем необходимы для комфортного проживания! кофеваркой, а также имеется общая кухня с индукционной плитой, общим холодильником, посудой, стиральной и сушильной машиной, полотенца, постельное белье, кондиционер в каждой комнате. Двойной санузел, большая душевая.
Всегда рады приветствовать гостей.

reviews.comments: Sharon is among the top 1% of hosts of Airbnb who greet guests with a big welcoming smile. The property is relaxed and homey in a good way and packed with nice touches and attention to detail. I was pleasantly surprised to find not only milk and water, but also coffee pods, cereals, home-baked orange cake, and roasted pecan nuts from the garden. The location is perfect for a couple interested in a quiet and peaceful place close to nature.  It is situated just walking distance from the village center and it is a 20 min drive to Haifa and about an hour to Tel Aviv. Great host: responsive, informative, attentive, and aims to please. Highly recommended.

We enjoyed our stay so much. The apartment is clean, welcoming and comfortable. The location is beautiful and calm and allow trips in the area. The host is super kind and reliable and was available all the time for any request. We will be happy to come back.
Great relaxed location. The apartment is brand new and well equipped. The host is exceptionally nice and welcoming. In summary, I highly recommend this facility.

We had a great, quiet weekend getaway at Sharon's place.
We loved it and look forward to staying there in the future.
Great place and location

description: Safety comes first! We are doing an extra deep cleaning due to Covid-19 for your safety!Welcome! This brand new spacious top unit condo lets you live like a home away from home, located in the heart of the north of Israel! 7 minutes drive from the sands of Haifa beach! You can watch the sunset on your private rooftop while swinging in a double size hummock or just getting some sun on the tanning bed. This 3 bedroom & 2 bathroom unit comes with all amenities for the best vacation!!!The spaceOur completely modern rooftop condo has all the modern features you’d want and need.The kitchen, dining room, and living room are all one spacious, open, and bright space including smart tv, water bar, Nespresso machine, dishwasher, and even a ping pong table! 2 strong air conditioning for the Israeli hot days and a fire stove to get you warm in the winter. Through the living room, you will reach the side balcony including chairs, coffee tables, and BBQ. All the mattresses and pillows are top quality for the best sleeping experience, since we understand how important it is. The master bedroom has a California king-size bed (2.00\2.00), smart tv with cables, and a large walk-in private glass design shower. The 2nd bedroom is a bright room with double windows and a double bed.The 3rd bedroom has 2 Single bed and a smart tv with cables. The guest bathroom has a shower.My favorite place in the apartment is the 60 meters sunset and sunrise view rooftop!!!Guest accessThe condo is 100% private for you! Lower level gardens are restricted as it is reserved for bottom floor tenants.Free street parking right outside the apartment is available. We're happy to light a fire for you, but please don't do that on your own, head-noticed required.Other things to noteThe condo is further polished with:3 smart tv with cables TV(more than 150 channels)Fast Wifi connection Washer and dryer with no extra feeFresh linens, towels, TOP quality mattresses and pillows. You will feel like boutique hotel.Kitchen with all appliances you’ll need for a home-cooked mealStreetside parking availablePing pong tableFire stove***60 meters rooftop with hummock, tanning bed, comfortable chairs, and table***.And much more!
additional_house_rules:
If you need anything or anything bothers you, please let us know so we will be able to help you and provide the best time we can in our house.

As of the the Security section of the Airbnb Community Standards requested, know that there is a Demo camera outside the front door in the stars is section. Don’t worry this camera isn’t working and it just cause the insurance required us to do so. 

There is free automatic filtered hot/cold water in the kitchen. You are more than welcome to help yourself!

The garden downstairs is not part of our property.. sorry! No entry isnt allowed, you are more than welcome to use the balcony to get some good sun or breath some fresh air. This is also the smoking area.

I will be glad to help you get familiar with the area. There are a supermarket, gym, running area, basketball and soccer facilities nearby. 
The house is located above the metro station to Haifa and Lev Hamifratz.

See you soon!
interaction: self-check-in! I'm always happy to give tips about the area and any place you're interested in visiting. The house is for your convince and privacy and we won’t be around the area unless you will need something.
transit: The location of the listing is perfect right at the entrance of the city so no traffic problems at all, also it is close to public transportation.The neighborhood is super safe and friendly, free parking is available on the street.

reviews.comments: Lad was by far the best Airbnb host I’ve ever experienced. He accommodated our religious requirements, was extremely responsive even though he was in a very different time zone, and he was super friendly and answered all our questions and gave the best recommendations for traveling to the apartment, and for restaurants and supermarkets in the area. The place was squeaky clean with no issues and was FAR better than the pictures portrayed it. Would 100% stay here again! The neighbors were very friendly and street parking was so easy. And the roof was incredible!
Terrific place.  Great showers.    Fantastic bed.  Easy street parking

Beautiful home! The pictures don't do it justice. My husband and I felt very comfortable during our month long stay here. The location is great. Within walking distance to grocery store and local transit. Being from America, I found it quite easy to find my way around. Elad replied quickly to every question we had and was very helpful and courteous. A perfect experience, thank you!

Very convenient and modern.
We’ll equipped.
Good location.
Good communication.

Amazing location first of all,close to the beach,restaurants,supermarket,gas stations transport.
The house are so clean and comfortable,make feeling like home.
Lad was very helpful with everything that we asked for(we didn’t need much the house was ready as hotel)
There is sinagog 15-20 meter from the house
I just loved this place

Lovely big space. First floor. Great kitchen with all the amenities along with oils salts coffee etc so you don’t have to pack every little spice. Air conditioners in every room, a great master bathroom and shower. Didn’t spend anytime on the terrace because it was 35C while we stayed but that was fine.

The house is very close to the main road arteries north east and south. A great base for your travels in the north. Ample parking on the small side street right in front of the house.

5 min walk to a supermarket. There is a small local synagogue directly across the street.

Lad’s place was exactly the property we needed for a night in Kiryat Ata.
Communication was fantastic and Lad was truly accommodating.

The kitchen was fully equip and even had spices and the usual coffee tea+!_ nespresso machine and cleansed water machine.

The rooftop is fantastic and little wooden games await in the living room with a huge TV with hundreds of channels.

All 3 rooms had great sized double beds (one room with a super king) and it was just great.

I’d recommend this property and host anytime. Thanks for having us Lad.
Very cute, spacious... Very close to Haifa and the beach. The the master bathroom/shower and bed are spectacular. Tidy, comfortable, big kitchen area. We enjoyed it!
The place was sparkling clean

Elad is a very nice host and he was available for us all the time. He & his parents were very kind and check to see that everything is fine. Also, elad turn the hot water heater remotely for us when we were not at home.

The house is very spacious, more then in the pictures. The kitchen is very comfortable and well equipped. The parents unit is well designed, and the shower had a great stream, a lot of space and it was indulgent. The couch, bed, sheets and pillows were very comfortable, and are of good quality.
We enjoyed our stay here.

אני בטוח שכל פעם שאזדמן לבוא לצפון זו תהיה הבחירה הראשונה שלי.

+ Квартира большая, кухня полностью укомплектована для полноценного приготовления пищи: плита, духовка, микроволновка и вся необходимая посуда. Фильтр холодной и горячей воды. Во всей квартире 4 кондиционера, удобные кровати, удобные подушки, огромная мягкая кровать в основной спальне, есть бельё, полотенца. Квартира очень чистая. Есть своя парковка на территории дома. Рядом автобусная остановка 2 минуты пешком. Большой супермаркет 8 минут пешком. Своя стоянка с автоматическими воротами. Отец хозяина всегда был готов помочь, сразу помог когда выбило пробки, и заело ключ от замка. Хозяин идет на встречу при решении спорных вопросов.

- Квартира находится на втором этаже таунхауса (это не целый таунхаус), к ней ведет крутая лестница без перил, с ребенком было сложно подниматься и спускаться. На первом этаже живут родители хозяина ( это не указано в описании квартиры)
В первый же день приезда нам сообщили, что протекает основной душ и туалет и что это будет отремонтировано за 2-3 дня, но пользоваться можно. После этого месяц мы пользовались душем и нам постоянно говорили и показывали, как там у них течет все и стены сырые, в итоге нас попросили не пользоваться основной ванной комнатой на 2 недели, после ремонта через некоторое время снова началась протечка, в которой хозяин обвинил нас через службу поддержки, по его словам мы устроили вечеринку и засорили канализацию, что было абсолютной ложью.
Квартира находится у оживленной трассы с одной стороны, а с другой шиномонтаж, который работает с 5 утра, спать особенно с маленьким ребенком невозможно, открыть окна ночью невозможно, очень шумно.
В квартире есть муравьи, мы сообщили хозяину, хозяин предложил капитальную обработку дома или дать средство от муравьев, в итоге ы согласились на средство, сами обрабатывали, но они появлялись снова, ребенка кусали.
Дом находится в религиозном районе у синагоги, что накладывает сильный отпечаток на пребывание, особенно в праздники (нельзя делать шашлык в шабат и т.д.). Также, нельзя делать шашлык на балконе.
Некоторые вещи по фото не соответствуют реальности: на балконе стоит старый палет и рулон газона(но может к вашему приезду будет убран), диван не кожаный, а старый тканевый, при заезде не было сушилки белья, ее по нашему запросу привезли через пару недель.
Есть камера (в зоне стирки белья), напротив входа.

The apartment’s location in the old city makes it the ideal stay in Akko. The view from the rooftop is stunning and is the best spot for a morning coffee overlooking the city. The ceilings in the space are high, and they give the home an airy light feel. I definitely recommend this stay!

Elad's place is the perfect location for a weekend getaway in Akko! The spot is located right in the center of the old city, and you can walk to all the historical spots very easily, as well as the port, and the market.  There is amazing food in the city, and it is especially beautiful to visit during the summer when there is a cool breeze from the sea.

Large apartment situated in the heart of the Old Town with a small patio upstairs.

If you need a dark bedroom then bring an eye mask.
Interesting space, easy access to the market and a short walk to restaurants and sights. Great recommendations from host on places to eat.
A very clean room in beautifully preserved old city. Needs a little work.
Perfect location for visiting Akko. The place was incredibly clean and the rooftop terrace was very impressive. Loved!
Beautiful place and great host.

The good: Staying at Elad's place is a fantastic way to experience the old city of Akko. The guest house is beautiful with high ceilings and stylish decoration but also very comfortable (the bed is one of the best I slept on in Israel). The rooftop is superb with a great view of the old city and a glimpse of the sea. he kitchen is well stocked with many of the basic supplies and spices needed for making dinner in-house if you choose (and we did choose a couple times since food prices at most places definitely seem inflated for tourists). Overall, Al Isrisi was a terrific place to stay while visiting Akko.

The not-so-good: We rented a car to get around Israel and for both nights that we stayed at Al Isrisi we parked in the public parking area just outside the wall. The first night, the car was fine. But the morning we checked out, we returned to find a crew of police officers around our rental car: our car had been broken into overnight with the passenger window smashed in. The lot was packed when we parked in the evening, but it was nearly empty in the morning and our car sat alone in a pile of broken glass. Thank God we had bought the full coverage rental car insurance and we had taken all of our valuables into the guest house with us! The damage and loss could have been much worse. We spent the morning at the police station filling out a report (all the officers were exceptionally kind). So this is just a cautionary tale for those of you who plan to drive and park in Akko during your stay. The free public parking area is nice, but risky. Find the most visible spot closest to the entrance/exit, make sure you are well-insured and definitely do not leave anything of value in the car.

My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay. Elad gave amazing recommendations and the Airbnb is the perfect location which made exploring around the old city extremely easy and gave us an amazing and unique experience.
Elad's place is conveniently located in the ❤ of the old town. We loved the place. It was clean and well taken care of.  We definitely recommend Elad's cute lil apt. to a future guests. R&E

Our time at Elads place was great! Definitely worth staying the night; we stayed two. Check in was easy. The place was gorgeous and perfect. His suggestions for food we're spot on.

Uri Buri, omg.

Great place in the heart of the old town. Magda, the woman who takes care of the place, is really lovely and invited me for coffee at some point. Great place to spend a romantic weekend but even as a break from work as I did it, it is a great choice. The rooftop terrace overlooks all of Akko and it is a lovely place to spend hours on end. Nurit is really helpful and responds quickly to emails. Will be back!
I highly recommend staying here. The location is phenomenal and Elad is great with communication. Also, if you have a car, there is free parking nearby.

Ronit, who assumed hosting duties in her son's absence, was very kind and thoughtful, making our stay all the better. She even made a batch of cookies for us that was waiting for us when we arrived.

The apartment was very nice and centrally located in Old Town Acre (Akka) a short distance from the bus stop. It was much larger than expected and had a good size kitchen complete with a small fridge, electric kettle, microwave and everything needed to cook or eat in if we so chose. The bedroom was very large with a comfy king size bed, LED TV with Roku, a drawer for clothes, and a small rack on which to hang clothes. The ceilings throughout the apartment are more than 10 feet tall with old wood beams, making the space seem all that much bigger. The bathroom was also very large as was the shower and there were plenty of towels for us to use.

We had to deal with a few minor leaks in the roof while we were there, but we understand that this has been a particularly wet winter and that things like that can be unforeseen. It was only a minor inconvenience and Ronit responded immediately, so it did not effect my rating.

One thing you should be aware of if renting this apartment. There is a mosque less than 100 meters away and with call to prayer occurring five times a day, once at 5am daily, you will be awakened unless you are an extremely heavy sleeper. I am a light sleeper and was unable to get back to sleep the first two mornings, but apparently adjusted the last three nights we stayed there.

This apartment is in the center of Old Town Acre close to restaurants, shops and markets. There is a small market immediately downstairs that has nearly anything you might need, including a sandwich counter. Old Acre is easy to walk with signs pointing you toward key landmarks. We were there in December, so many businesses and restaurants were either closed or on winter hours due to the lack of tourists, making it a bit of a challenge to find a decent place to eat in the evening. We paid a total of $66.50 per night for five nights ($332.50, including all fees), a terrific value for such a nice apartment in such a good location, even with the early morning wake-ups (one Bomb deduction).

CombatCritic Gives Elad's Old Acre Apartment 9 Bombs Out Of 10 ... More Bombs Are Better!
Perfect location and a great space for a stay in the old city. Comfy bed. Wonderful host. Highly recommend.
Great location, set up thoughtfully and beautifully.

Hidden getaway gem! Rustic, quaint,  tucked away behind a corner store of small open square where locals meet, and children play, in old Akko. The photos do not give the justice of the breathtaking view from the top, or how big it is, with high ceilings. Rustic and charming. Super clean, comfy firm beds and pillows, well equipped in the kitchen to cook, reheat, chop, or refrigerate. Tons of windows, A/C, extra blankets. Do have to go up some tiny flight of stairs, but it makes you feel like a local. People welcomed us to the neighborhood and made us feel safe, and at home. Genuine community atmosphere. People do stay up a bit late, but they start later in the morning, too. Very communicative host and was attentive. Loved my experience! The best surprise, and AirBnB on our trip.

Elad's place might be one of the coolest places I've ever stayed at. It is very well located (and the directions given are very clear) within the old city where you are just a short walk from literally every tourist site in town. The apartment itself is very large and very clean. The rooftop provides an incredible view of the old city and the neighbors are very, very nice. if I am ever back in Akko, I am for sure going to try to stay here again.

Great and unique place in the heart of old Akko. Pleasent, clean and very close to all the attractions of the old town
Elad the host, was very caring and helpful with everything we needed
good location, but could be more attentive for small details

Great apartment in a superb location.
gets you into the Acre atmosphere!
I do have to mention there were a few problems: wifi was not working, but fixed quickly.
Also, bathroom door was not closing properly. Owner came and partially fixed the issue, but not fully.
anyway, I would highly recommend staying here for local vibes & feel.
Another thing to consider: mosques' call to prayer is really loud, but again - adds to the atmosphere.
Elad's place all you can ask for to get the full Acco experience.  .The place is nice,clean and inviting. We recommend it highly.

A very nice, well equipped apartment in the heart of the old city. Beautiful high ceilings gives a feeling of space, nicely styled. Elad and Magda are very helpful. Right under the house there is a small grocery shop, whose owner Ahmed prepares the best sandwiches for breakfast.  Warmly recommended!
great place in Akko old city!

We a wonderful stay at elad's apartment.
Very comfy and at a great location.
Elad was very empathic to our beta
needs.
beautiful spot!
Very nice,clean and comfortable appartement in the old city,very close to everything.

Al Idrissi is an oasis in the beautiful Old City of Akko. It’s the second time I’ve stayed there this year. Elad and Magda are super nice, friendly and helpful. The space is excellent. There is a good sized roof space to watch the sunrise and sunset over the bay of Akko.
Al idrissi is really good value (I’ve visited Akko many times and the few hotels there are aren’t amazing and are expensive).
From al idrissi its a few minutes walk to the sea wall- or further into the old city, the other direction. The apartment has good amenities- and the shower is amazing! (Those huge square shower heads). Shop next to the apartment for basic food (milk, bread, juice etc etc).

We had a brilliant stay here during the week of passover. Akko is gorgeous and this place is right in the old city. The apartment is huge, with high ceilings, spacious bathroom  and bedroom. Big windows so very bright! Generally Akko is pretty peaceful and quiet, you do hear the sound of the muezzin from the mosque pretty loudly a few times a day/early in the morning, but didn't have a problem going back to sleep after it. The roof space is lovely too, with a nice view over the rooftops of Akko. Highly recommend staying here. Akko is small and you have access to everything on foot. As other reviewers said, parking is a little tricky and the stairs to the apartment are steep, so can be a bit difficult to get luggage into the apartment.

We highly recommend this apartment. We were the first guests after a lock-down and there were a few hitches with the heating and TV, but Elad, Magda and her husband  immediately came to help us, and it was all fixed and warmed up quickly. The apartment is comfortable and the view from the roof is amazing. The apartment is  in a perfect location for the wonderful Old City of Acco and touring in the area.

Al-Idrissi is a really great place to stay in Akko. It is in the heart of the old  city, with stunning rooftop views, very close to all the amenities and sights in this beautiful UNESCO heritage city.

Gorgeous apartment! located in the spectacular old city, minutes from the beach, the market and some great resturants. Even during coronavirus, there is so much to see! Elad was super kind and helped us with anything we needed.
Lovely central apartment with great views from the roof terrace. Just as advertised - would definitely recommend

We had a great time in the apartment. The room is very stylish and inviting.
The whole apartment was very clean and accommodated with everything you might need.

You should note the the stairs to the apartment and especially to the roof is somewhat steep so it might be a problem for older visitors.

We had a great stay at Elad's place in the middle of the old city. The bed was super comfortable with memory foam pillows. We never met Elad in person, but communication was smooth, and prior to the arrival we received a PDF file with all information we needed for the comfortable stay at his place and things to visit in Akko. Will be coming back and recommending it to our friends. :)

The apartment was perfect. Great location in the heart of the old town, rooftop with an amazing view for a morning cafe and a night drink. Magda from downstairs was always available, helpful and sweet. It was a perfect choice.
This is a wonderful apartment! I highly recommend it
Nice apartment in the heart of old acre. The apartmert was nice and clean, and Majda who looks after the place was very cooperative. A grocery store 20m from entrance is open till 10PM ..
Amazing place, super clean and excellent location. To enter the place you will pass in front of the neighbors place with doors open. Other than that it's perfect.

Elad is an outstanding host. The apartment was sparkling clean in an amazing location - within walking distance to the market and the port. The apartment itself is very charming and cozy and well equipped. Highly recommended
The place is wonderful, big, nice view, and eating dinner on the rooftop while the moazin went was a great experience. I will definitely come back again!

Elad was a fantastic host. Great communication and going beyond to assist us in checking in on a cold and very wet evening.
The property was so central to everything when we found our way around in the daylight. Highly recommend.

A spacious, clean and unique apartment . Perfect for feeling like you live there. I stayed there with my 8 year old son and we had a magical weekend. Elad was extremely accomodating as were all of the neighbors and people we met. Thanks for a wonderful and unique experience.

We had a great week in this flat.
Grear location and imertion in the arab way of life.
Historic and clean apartment above the friendliest shopkeeper who speaks perfect English. Wonderful fresh grilled fish by the sea. Crusaders hall one of the highlights. We loved the experience.
perfect, perfect, Perfect

Book without hesitation! Pictures don't do justice to Al Idrisi. The apartment is a little slice of serenity. The twenty foot ceilings really add to the romance of the place - perfect to cuddle up and watch a movie after a long day of sight seeing. The place is quiet, the water pressure is great and the water gets really hot. The rooftop is so cute but sadly we didn't use it because it was cold and rainy during our visit. There are lots of towels of all sizes which is something so many Airbnb hosts fall short on. The local recommendations were on point (hummus Abu Sohil is worth going! )

We even tried the local breakfast downstairs with ahmad (we feel we were overcharged but hey it's convenient).

Re parking: We were lucky to find a "free" spot at the city gate - here an old man asks you for money (20 nis) and we just paid up. Later we moved our heavy bags into the apartment to be safe (not fun given the steep stairs but doable). There's paid parking in other areas.
Akko is a splendid place to visit. Elad's place has a perfect location and once you get there it is nice and charming. The access to the apartment, though,  is a little bit tricky.
A very nice apartment in the hart of old acre. Elad is a great host and the apartmert was nice and clean.

Elad Appartment is indeed a romantic experience. Situated in
the Historic Center accompanied by
the Chanting of the Muezzin and walking the narrow roads of Old Akko you defenitely have a taste of
ancient Times. The Appartment itself is spacious ,well kept and clean.
The walk up there is a challenge especially with suitcases and the roofterrace definitely needs a makeover. All in all we had a great time at Elad‘s apartment.
Very nice place, very well located !

This is a delightful second floor hideaway in the middle of Akko.  A large comfortable bed, spacious kitchen and amazing rooftop views (up another level of stairs). The directions on how to reach the entrance were very helpful since Akko is a maze of streets. The host was prompt to answer any questions. Definitely good value.

The flat of Elad is a perfect place for a romantic stay in the  heart of the old city of Akko in a quite corner. From the flat you can visit the whole city and enjoy the best restaurants. The flat itself is like in pictures, authentic and we'll decorated with a nice rooftop to enjoy a unique view over the city. The kitchen and equipment is really helpful as well!
Very nice and cosy place, well situated right in the old city. Some things did not work, e.g. the two lamps at the bed, the kitchen faucet was broken.
We had a very pleasant stay
Great Location in the old town!
Very nice location, great comfort

Nice apartment in the old town of Acre. All sights are really close by. The bed was super comfy and the directions (including (Hidden by Airbnb) maps links) worked very well.

Please be aware that the call for prayer might wake you in the morning (although it’s nice to hear). The shower only had cold water when I was there. The kitchen sink/water tab could use some renovation.
Beautiful home in a great location!

Elad’s place was fantastic. Excellent location in the heart of Akka's arabic old town. The place was very clean and had everything we needed. Communication was great and was able to find the place easily through the detailed instructions provided by Ronit. Would definitely consider staying there agian.

Perfect apartment in the old town of Acre. Privileged location. But don't panic when you get to the apartment. It is situated between winding and dark streets. The main door is very curious.
Spacious, clean and bright apartment.
The windows do not isolate and all the noise of the street is heard, also the call to the prayer of the mosque at dawn.
100% recommended.
Everything was perfect and he was really helpful with us.

This was our best Airbnb apartment in Israel. A lovely place. Bit tricky to find, due to the streets of the old town acre, but they are offering a good description. It has a huge bedroom and a huge bathroom. It really surprised us, how big the apartment is. We spent one evening on the beautiful roof terrace. Very comfy bed. Good working ACs. Would highly recommend.
It is located well in the heart of the old town. We parked our rental car at a free parking lot outside the old town walls. It was just a quick walk.

Wonderful apartment in the heart of the old town. Very comfortable bed. The furniture is beautiful and the apartment has many interesting details. The owner even arranged to bring a dress to Tel Aviv that I forgot in the apartment. For dinner, breakfast or lunch, I can recommend the restaurant Turkiz in the old town, not far from the apartment: very friendly owner and awesome food.
Excellent place, very well located, very clean, excellent matress, clearly recommended!

Great apartment in the heart of the old city! lovely grocery store downstairs, perfectly spacious and clean, the bed is super comfortable, the view from the rooftop is amazing ( you can sit there and chill with a stunning view) can be noisy sometimes downstairs but overall it was quiet. just saying, there is a strong light coming in from outside in the morning so be aware of you have difficulties to sleep with lights, for me,  it works well I kind of enjoyed it :) overall the apartment is amazing with the best location you can get!  I definitely recommended and will come back again :)
Perfect in Akko !
Just perfect

The apartment is exactly like on the photos. Large, clean, and comfortable it's located in the old town. From the roof terrace you have a beautiful view of the city. The host was very quick to respond and very helpful.
We recommend Elad's apartment

We had a great stay at Elat's apartment. It was as shown in the pictures and very clean & comfortable. The neighborhood was a bit noisy in the night, but still acceptable. Check-in and check-out were uncomplicated.
We had a very nice stay! Very authentic place in the old city!

We had a great time at Elads beautiful apartment!
The location is amazing, the Apartment super-tidy and really cosy. Thanks again, Elad!

Elad's apartment really matched  our hopes and expectations. Superb location in the old town. It was charming, but well appointed and clean. Elad was a very helpful and efficient host, and Magda's welcome was warm and friendly. Thank you very much indeed.

We had a wonderful stay at Elad and Ronit's place! The apartment was very clean, and the rooftop area was a lovely place for our morning tea and breakfast. Elad and Ronit were quick to answer our questions before and during our stay. We also found the location to be superb, it was very central to the many interesting places in the Old City and we'd recommend other guests to stay here too!

Everthing is written down. You get a lovely place in a bustling old town full of life. The stairs to the appartement are narrow and steep, if you have to handle bulky luggage. At 6 o clock the mosque crier gives you an idea of Dynamic-Range :-).  The patio was not to use, because of broken chairs. Mister Achmed, with the everthing-shop, speaks german and is very helpful. Recommendation for Elads appartement.

Large, useful space -- very clean.  We really appreciated the location: super close to the souq; very friendly people downstairs at the general store  (literally next to the apartment) who were helpful in every way.  When we return to Akko we would  love to stay here again!

We stayed 3 nights in this nice place in an authentic neighbourhood. From the roof terrace we had a great view over the city although the terrace was a bit under construction. Always close the terrace door, otherwise cats go in the appartment! Bed sheets weren’t the newest. Ronit always answered quickly and was very helpful.

First of all, I just have to say this is one of the best, most sparkling clean, homely spaces I've ever stayed. It is absolutely immaculate. Beautiful tiled floor, super-high ceilings and plenty of natural light ans right in the middle of the old city, steps away from the market. Ahmad who owns the shop below is one of the friendliest people you'll meet and Ronit is such a nice and personable host. STAY HERE!!!

Great location in the old center. Very nice apartment and good equipment. Elad and Ronit are great with the communication. The image of the fish was very helpful in finding the place :).
I really recommend it.
We had a great stay at Elad's apartment. The flat is located in the mid of the old city centre is stylishly decorated.

All great! Nice place in a cozy old town. Very comfortable bed and beautiful furniture.
There is quite a lot of light coming in in the mornings, so if that bothers you better bring an eye mask. All in all, very comfortable space - perfect for a weekend trip.
Great location, value for money
Very nice room, clean and comfortable with everything we need. Ronit is very kind and warm, respond fast to our request. Location is good and easy to get main spot in old city.
Great for couples
great place and great location!
Great location,  clean and stylish place. Wonderful host.
The appartement is very well situated in the middle of the old city. It is very charming and calm. And the rooftop is just perfect ! I strongly recommand it !

We had three amazing days in the beautiful old city of akko. The appartement let us feel the vibes of this stunning place. It is a very comfortable and cozy place to stay, the rooftop is amazing. Even we had no personal contact with elad or ronit, they were always available through messages. thanks a lot!
Nice place
Highly recommended!

Al Idrisi is in the heart of the Old City. After climbing up the narrow stairs, the door opens into a large, spacious and lovely apartment.
We enjoyed our stay here
A great place, very authentic, well decorated, great location and hospitality

Very good accomodation in the old city. The apartment is pictoresque, clean, well organized and freshly renovated. There is a spacious terrace with a great view of El-Jazzar mosque. I can only recommend it. Thank you!
Charming place in a friendly neighborhood in the old center. Everything as described and shown on the pictures! We enjoyed the sun on the roof top every morning and evening...
This is a spacious, clean and nice apartment in the old town of Akko. It was one of our favorite apartments during our stay in Israel. We also liked the terrasse a lot. We can recommend this place.

We really enjoyed our stay at Elad's place. The apartment is exactly as pictured, very clean and the facilities are brand new. Elad was very responsive, even though he was travelling, too, and the very friendly neighbours made sure we felt at home. By far the best accommodation of our stay in Israel! Would stay there again.
The apartment is great and really recommendable. We were really satisfied with everything and enjoyed our stay. Thanks Elad!
יופי של דירה, מעוצבת בטוב טעם. מקום אותנטי מלא אווירה. קרוב לכל מה שמעניין בעכו. הקיוסק למטה גם נחמד מאד
מקום חמוד ונעים, מלא אויר ואור. מאד נהניתי
נופש נפלא. היינו שני לילות, הכל היה מדוייק, נקי, נעים ומפנק. מומלץ

אלעד המארח היה מאוד ידידותי, הוא שלח לי הוראות הגעה וטיפים לאזור, ההגעה גם קלה יחסית אם משתמשים בגוגל מפות לניווט רגלי, הדירה מאוד נקיה ומוארת וממש מרווחת וגם מאוד יפה. המיקום מצויין 2 דקות הליכה מהשוק, למרות שקצת חשוך במידה ומגיעים בלילה.
הגג ממש נחמד והיה גם נטפליקס, המיזוג ממש סבבה ויש חניה במרחק של 200מ׳ בעלות של 20ש״ח ל24 שעות.
קחו בחשבון שיש מואיזין ממש קרוב, לי זה לא הפריע דווקא הוסיף לאותנטיות ולחוויה.

לצערנו עקב אירוע מצער  רפואי לא הגענו לחופשה. אלעד הבין את המצב ובצורה רגישה מאוד ביטל הכל. התבאסנו שלא יכולנו להגיע גם בגלל שהדירה נראית מיוחדת ונעימה וחיכינו לטייל וגם בגלל היחס החם והמכבד של אלעד.. נחזור ברגע שנוכל

הדירה מקסימה ונראית בדיוק כמו בתמונות... המיקום מצויין, קרוב לכל מה שיש לעיר העתיקה של עכו להציע...
בפעם הראשונה מעט קשה למצוא את הכתובת אבל זה בהחלט אפשרי... חניונים וחניה ציבורית מסביב לעיר העתיקה ומרחק ההליכה הוא גג 500 מטר מכל מקום שתחנו בערך.
מומלץ מאוד!
מקום נחמד בלב העיר העתיקה של עכו היתה חופשה מהנה ושהות נעימה בדירה

מודה מאוד לאלעד על אירוח מעולה ! בעל בית זמין וגמיש ונכס מסוגנן וגדול מאוד עם הרבה מרווח.

תודה
אחלה דירה, מיקום מעולה ממש בעיר העתיקה, קרוב לכל

אירוח מדהים. הדירה מרשימה, המיקום נהדר והזמינות של אלעד ורונית (והשכנה מגדה) הייתה מאוד מהירה!
עכו עיר מדהימה ומאוד ממולץ להתארח כאן ולצאת לטייל!
תודה לאלעד שצירף לנו חוברת עמוסה בהמלצות והכוונה למקומות.
מיקום אדיר צמוד לשוק, דירה להיט עם גג שמשקיף על כל עכו, שכנים נחמדים ממש הכל נקי ובקיצור תענוג
נהנינו מאוד! השכנים מקסימים וכולם נתנו לנו הרגשה טובה. הדירה מרווחת ונוחה. הייתה לנו חוויה נהדרת.

אחלה מיקום, דירה שנראית טוב.
בעל נכס גמיש.
שווה ביקור לזוג :)

דירה במיקום מצויין, ממש בתוך העיר העתיקה, קרוב לכל מקום.
יש סופר למטה שפתוח מהבוקר ועד מאוחר וגם מכין משהו קטן לאכול.
הדירה מרווחת מאוד, בעיצוב יפה.
מאגדה, בעלת הדירה שלמטה הייתה מאוד נחמדה וממש מרגישים כאילו גרים בשכונה. למעלה יש גג (לא מרפסת) שאפשר לשבת ויש נוף מדהים על העיר העתיקה והים.
העניין היחיד הוא שהיא לא מתאימה לכל אחד, כי יש שם מדרגות אל הדירה וגם בתוך הדירה (אל הגג). מצד שני, זה מה שנותן לה את היחוד שלה. מומלץ לזוגות שמחפשים חוויה מיוחדת בעכו.
מקום מהמם, עם מיקום מצויין וממש מתאים למטיילים בלי רכב, ממליצים ממש בחום, גם בשיא הקורונה מצאנו המון מה לעשות בעכו ובאיזור

השהות בAl Idrisi, היתה חלומית! הבית ממוקם בתוך העיר עתיקה. מיד לאחר שהזמנו קיבלנו קובץ עם הסברים מפורטים על הגעה,חניה ודברים מומלצים לעשות באזור. הבית היה נקי, המיטה נוחה והגג נהדר . שווה מאוד להגיע לעכו!
מצד אחד האירוח פשוט, מצד שני יפה ורואים שיש מחשבה על הדברים הקטנים.
למי שאוהב אירוח במקום אותנטי שווה במיוחד!
אה וחשוב! יש מדרגות עליה לבית ומדרגות עלייה לגג.
היה נעים וחמים, אחלה מקום(:

מיקום מעולה בתוך העיר העתיקה, בית ערבי אוטנטי, קרוב מאוד למסגד כך שצריך לצפות למואזין ב4 לפנות בוקר,
יש כ30 מדרגות תלולות בדרך לדירה , חוויה מיוחדת ושונה,
דירה מעולה במיקום מעולה

Хорошие апартаменты, для тех, кто интересуется арабским Востоком . Хороший ремонт.  Все необходимые удобства есть. Шикарный телевизор. Все работает хорошо. Великолепный солярий на крыше с шикарными видами на старый город Акко. Вечером можно сидеть с бокалом вина и любоваться звездами. Самый красивый восход можно наблюдать с крыши. Мы получили огромный интерес и открыли для себя город Акко.
מקום נחמד. הקיוסק למטה מעולה ונעים.
אחלה מקום להתארח
היה מעולה
דירת חדר גדולה, יפה מרווחת, במיקום נפלא בעיר העתיקה, עם שכנים ידידותיים.

דירה נהדרת, מיקום מעולה.
ומעל הכל, מגדה המקסימה שמשדרגת את כל השהייה.
היה לנו טוב מאוד. בלב העיר העתיקה, עם נוף מהמם על עכו מהגג. רק חבל שאין צלייה בגג.
אחלה דירה, אחלה מיקום, אחלה מארחים והעיר העתיקה של עכו מגניבה וכיפית !! כדאי להיות מוכנים לקשיים במציאת חנייה אם מדובר בסוף שבוע
Preis Leistung ist ok, sauber aber alles recht einfach gestaltet.
reviews.response:
Hi Dorothea,
I am sorry you feel this way.
I do make sure our guests get our guidebook in advance, as I did with you.
If you would have read it you could find detailed information on how to get to the apartment and how to turn on the water heater and air conditioner.
I hope you still enjoyed your trip,
Elad

reviews.comments:
Großartige Unterkunft. Perfekte Lage mit tollen Ausblick auf die Altstadt!
Alles sehr sauber und ordentlich.
Sehr gerne wieder!
Suggerisco a tutti le persone interessate ad una permanenza ad Akko l'appartamento Al Idrisi per la comodità della posizione e per la qualità dell'alloggio. Roberto

Die Wohnung liegt mitten in der Altstadt an einem kleinen Platz, wo es auch einen Mini-Supermarkt gibt. Prima Lage, um das authentische Leben in Akko kennenzulernen. Nur wenige Gehminuten entfernt Moschee, der Souk und Restaurants.

Wunderschöne Unterkunft in Akko, die ich nur schweren Herzens verlassen habe. Ein Tipp: bei der Ankunft unbedingt die Wegbeschreibung des Vermieters befolgen, sonst  ist die Unterkunft nur schwer zu finden.
דירה מקסימה במיקום מצויין.  מאד נקייה עם כל מה שצריך.

Superbe logement plein de charme. Idéalement situé au cœur de la ville historique.
Pensez à amener un masque pour les yeux car le soleil se lève tôt, avant 6h, et la lumière passe à travers les rideaux. A recommander.

Wir fanden die Unterkunft genauso einzigartig wie auf den Bildern zu sehen. Der CheckIn war- nachdem wir die Unterkunft gefunden hatten- völlig problemlos.
Abends, wenn es nicht mehr heiß, aber noch angenehm warm war, haben wir den Ausblick von der Terrasse genossen.
Einzig das Waschbecken in der Küche war ein wenig schmutzig. Ansonsten waren wir mit der Sauberkeit sehr zufrieden. Das Bett war groß und sehr bequem. Falls wir nach Akko wiederkommen- dann unbedingt wieder in diese Unterkunft.

Wir lasen natürlich bereits die guten Bewertungen dieser Wohnung vor unserer Entscheidung, diese Unterkunft zu buchen, aber dass die Unterkunft tatsächlich solch eine     angenehme Atmosphäre hat, wissen wir erst jetzt. Es ist ein wunderbarer Ort, der offen, großzügig und sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet ist. Die Dachterrasse war unser morgendlicher Start in den Tag mit Sonnenaufgang und einer Tasse Cafe´ und Abschluss der Tages. Die Lage ist einzigartig und du bist damit sofort ein Teil dieser quirligen und fremden Welt der Altstadt in Akko. Jederzeit wieder würden wir genau diese Unterkunft buchen.
Sehr zu empfehlen

Appartement bien situé au cœur de la vieille ville.
Vue magnifique de la terrasse sur le toit.
Parking gratuit en dehors des remparts à environ 600 m
Dommage de n'avoir pas rencontré Elad mais il a su répondre rapidement à nos problèmes.

Schöne Unterkunft im Herzen der Altstadt Akkos mit allen Sehenswürdigkeiten direkt vor der Tür. Wir waren 3 Nächte da. Magda, die im gleichen Gebäude wohnt kümmert sich um den Check In, was sehr einfach und herzlich war. Sie leistet wirklich super Arbeit, denn das Apartment ist wirklich blitzsauber und schön hergerichtet. Es ist alles da was man braucht. Direkter Nachbar ist ein kleiner Shop, der alles hat was man noch so braucht und auch Snacks anbietet. Achmed, der Besitzer war auch sehr herzlich und hat uns weitere hilfreiche Tips gegeben. Sollten wir eines Tages wieder Akko besuchen, werden wir wieder dieses Apartment buchen! Tip Top!

Super Lage mitten in der historischen Altstadt. Super Preis-Leistungsverhältnis, vor allem für das sonst eher teure Israel. Das Appartement ist schön gross und entspricht den Fotos des Gastgebers. Mit Haartrockner, Duschgel, Seife, genügend Frotiertüchern, Toilettenpapier, etc. ausgerüstet. Freundliche & hilfsbereite Leute (Magda) unterhalb des Apptmts im selben Haus, Treppenaufgang zum Appartment etwas steil und schmal, ist soweit aber kein Problem. Wie man weiss, wird Akko/Acre mehrheitlich von moslemischer Bevölkerung bewohnt und somit hört man früh morgends um ca. 05.00Uhr auch den Muezin rufen. Wenn man davon erwacht, schläft man danach einfach weiter, gehört zur Kultur und soll auch so sein, soweit kein Problem. Der Gastgeber Elad/Ronit war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit.
Au centre, bien placé dans une ambiance locale très appréciable.nous avons aimé l’ambiance de ce petit coin de acre .

Die Wohnung ist wunderschön und sehr gut gelegen. Von der Dachterasse hat man eine tolle Aussicht über die Altstadt.
Die Wohnung ist sehr gut ausgestattet.
Eine individuelle Unterkunft mitten in der Altstadt Akkos. Toller Blick von der Dachterrasse.
Ein wunderschönes Apartment in der Altstadt mit Dachterrasse, sehr geschmackvoll, gute Ausstattung. Der Kontakt zum Gastgeber war unkompliziert und schnell.

El departamento es muy agradable y amplio. Hay todo lo que se puede necesitar para una buena estadía. Magda, la señora que cuida y recibe a la gente es muy solidaria y respetuosa de la intimidad. Recomiendo visitar ésta ciudad especial y hospedarse en al idrisi , la casa de Elad.

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed our stay at Anat's place.  The living room is spacious, with a comfortable sitting area, a simple but efficient kitchenette, and a table both inside and out.  We immediately felt "at home" with a fabulous library of books to choose from and a great merpesset with a view to the ocean, which greatly added to the experience.  The bed is very comfortable, and there's plenty of closet space. The beach is a 5 minute walk away, and there is a lot to do in the area.  We definitely plan to return.

It was our second stay in two weeks at Anat's Place.
It speaks for itself.

As usual- the apartment was spotless and fully equiped with all amenities needed for a pleasant stay.

We had a great time on the beach during the day and peaceful evenings on the porch.

We were lucky enough to visit while durin full moon nights abd the scenery on the beach was absolutely stunning.

We will defiantly come back!!

Anat's place is clean and comfortable, the small kitchen is equipped nicely and a gorgeous beach is within a 5min walk.
I asked for a crib which was waiting for me there. The train is very close but since we visited at the weekend it wasn't a problem. Tha outdoor shower was a great addition for the kiddo :)
great place to stay. clean, quiet and close to the beach!
Nice cozy place for a simple authentic experience in kibbutz. 2 min from the sea.
great location
Great location and peaceful atmosphere
Great location! 5 min. walk to the wild Beach. Loved the tranquility (close to highway & rail, but you can hardly hear them). Loved the wooden floor! Smooth check-in & Out, great communication!

Anat's place is cosy and has great atmosphere. It's so close to the beautiful beach, which makes the stay even more special.
I had an amazing time at this place, and definitely see myself coming back.

This vacation was easy and better than we expected. It's a simple home, but that is also it's charm. The little porch and coffee table outside in the corner is wonderful addition to use and enjoy. You can see the sea from there! (Although there is also the road and trains.) It was a really peaceful mini-vacation and being so near that beach was great. We saw every sunset and there were at most 5 other people. It was a great, easy place and I'd love to return!! Anat and her husband were very helpful and kind. Only 'bad' thing is that the walls are a bit thin and you can hear other apartment sometimes.

We had a great time in Anat’s place.
A sweet home with everything you need. A great place to relax and enjoy.
I will definitely recommend and come back soon!

the apartment is very functional, and designed in good taste. It is a perfect place to take your vacation , It was all we wished for and more.
the apartment gives a sense of home and is located in the best location for those who love the ocean.
just 3 min walk to one of Israel's most quite remote and peaceful beaches. As a kite surfer i had the best time surfing swimming sup surfing or just relaxing on the beach.
The best thing about the place is the sea view balcony where we enjoyed to eat are self made breakfast and dinner or just chill and look at the amazing sunset.
also got to take a nice day trip 5 min drive from the Kibutz to Nahal Zfonim a very recommended experience.
Anat and Dolev the Hosts where very reachable and answered quickly to all of are questions and needs.
It was very hard to leave and we will defiantly be back!!

The stay at Anat's place was great - The apartment is super cute, has a wonderful high ceiling and beautiful view from the balcony. The place is 4 minutes walk from the beach, which is also a natural reservation.
Anat was very helpful and answered real quick to all our requests and questions, the communication was great.
We hope to come back soon!

היחידה של ענת מקסימה! מצויידת בכל מה שצריך ונמצאת 5 דק הליכה מחוף ים בתולי ויפייפה. יש מקלחת חוץ נהדרת. האירוח איפשר לנו להנות הרבה ובקלות מהים.

התארחתי עם שני ילדי אצל ענת בקיבוץ החותרים. הבית היה נקי, ממקום מעולה במרחק הליכה מהים. מרפסת גדולה שבהחלט משדרגת את האיכות. נקודה שהייתה מאוד חשובה עבורי, המטבח אמנם לא גדול, אך היה בו כל מה שהייתי צריך בשביל להכין ארוחות מכל סוג. הכיריים מעולים וזה היה בונוס מרכזי מבחינתנו. המקום ללא ספק אופציה מבחינתי להגיע שוב
דירה מתוקה, נעימה ונקייה, מרחק של כמה דקות הליכה מהחוף.

description: Just a 5 minute walk (200m) from the beach, this newly renovated private studio is the perfect place to stay and experience Neve Yam's natural bays and lagoons as well as the Carmel Mountain's breathtaking setting and interesting touring attractions.The spaceWith a private entrance outside of the family home, this lovely studio is updated with modern appliances in the kitchen and bathroom, as well as access to cable TV and wifi. The room fits up to three people with a queen bed, foldaway guest bed, and plenty of extra blankets and pillows for your comfort. Glass sliding doors open up to a beautiful gated backyard with lawn chairs to relax and watch the sunset.
interaction: We can arrange to pick you up from the nearby Atlit train station (just a 5 minute drive), and are also happy to provide tips on fun activities in the area.

reviews.comments:
I strongly recommend this place.
The beach and the flat are beautiful!
Nir is really a superhost.
Amazing
Great location- 5 min walk from beach! Flexible with check in and very quick responses! Highly recommend staying at Nir’s place!
Beautiful location. Great place
Nir's place is all about location- if you want a quiet place close to a beautiful beach, you have got it! The accommodations are basic but clean and comfortable, and the hospitality was great.

Very welcoming & friendly family.
Home made chocolate cake, fresh fruit and wine waited for us upon arrival.
Thanks much
Guy & Mor

The listing description is accurate. When we arrived, the host - Nir was waiting for us and gave us all the needed information.

The main beauty of this place is the sea shore. Just a short walk from the studio. Untouched sand beach. Long walks in the early morning.

This place was great, and the beach was beautiful and a very short walk away.  My fiancee and I really enjoyed staying on the kibbutz and being able to walk through it. The space is beautiful and peaceful. Nir and his wife were wonderful hosts and they gave us a lot of food upon our late arrival. It was so nice being around children and nature. The beach was a great place to use my new camera. Neve Yam was really close to our family function too. Nir and his family are great people and we would definitely stay here again!

Nir was the best host! We didn't have a car & he graciously drove us anywhere & everywhere, including into Zichron Yaakov & even to the grocery store. The studio is clean, beautiful & right on the beach. I couldn't recommend the space & the hosts enough! We would definitely come back to stay again.
Charming and very accessible host, the studio is situated in one of the most beautiful spots along the northern coast of the Mediterranean. Very relaxing and friendly

Amazing location! The best beach in Israel is only a 4 min walk.
Nir's place was super clean and cozy, the backyard has both sun and shade, perfect for relaxing.
Nir is super nice and we'll come back for sure

The place is clean cozy and simple. Has the basic necessities for living
Its biggest advantage is the beautiful beach 5 minutes walk from the apartment

A very cute and perfectly located studio for a beach getaway. Clean and comfortable.

3 minute walk to the beach - Nir and Hamutal are extremely sweet and genuine in their desire for guests to enjoy the stay. Highly recommended location for a short beach vacation where being close to the water is high on list of priorities.
3 min away from the beach, everything you'd need is there. Nir and his family help with everything. great value for money.

This is hands down my best Airbnb experience of all times. Hamutal and Nir are the most helpful and adorable people you can meet. Eventhough it is a studio that is next to there house, you feel like in your own home with the most incredible neighbors in the world. If you're looking for beach and nature, this is also the best spot possible. Last of all, the studio looks exactly like on the pics, no dissapointements at all. I had an incredible stay. Thank you guys!!!
Great location. Beautiful beach. Luxurious apartment- definitely would recommend!

Neve Yam is a cool funky spot only 4 mins from the beach, and Nir's studio apartment is the perfect place to enjoy the beautiful beach. Small, basic studio but everything was thoughtfully equipped and provided. My favorite part was the small private back yard; I  asked for a BBQ to use and Nir provided me with a great one to use. We hope to be back!
Very nice, clean and well-equipped unit. The surroundings can be better maintained and equipped.
reviews.response:
Hi the surroundings were influenced from the strong winter storm
we will take your remarks into consideration
Take care

reviews.comments:
We had a great time at Nir's place!
The studio apt is renovated, clean and close to the the beach.
Nir welcomed us in the apartment and gave us recommendations for stuff to check out in the area.
A nice place a few steps away from the beach
Nice, clean place just 5 minutes from the beach! And the best hospitality we had! A true superhost!
Had great time, really 5 minutes from the amazing beach!
Great place and host! Loved it
Nir place is magical, just by the amazing rural beach of Neve Yam. It's a nice unit with garden 5 mins walk from the beach. Very lovely and helpful host.
Very nice owners.Were very helpfull with everything including recomendations regarding restaurants.The place is very close to the beach.

Amazing host, helped us with whatever we needed very fast and agreed to take us in a few hours before the real check in time which was amazing.
Highly recommended

We stayed a whole week in Nir‘s apartment and enjoyed it so much. Everything was as described except for the near beach which was just amazing.
Nir and his wife are wonderful hosts, very kind and helpful. We were even invited for a barbecue at independence day and had a great and very interesting afternoon with them.
We surely will come back once we visit Israel again.

Lovely, bright and super clean studio in walking distance (5 min) to a nice beach. Small private garden in the back, nice for breakfast. We would like thank our host for her exceptional hospitality - great amenities in the apartment, easy communication and also she provided us with an abundance of homemade food!

Nir and his family are lovely- we had a great time. The beach is beautiful although it wasn’t warm enough to go there often. But Atlit is a good spot to do tours in the area - Haifa, Akko, etc. We also liked the Studio. It is exactly like in the pictures.
We had a wonderful stay and Nir's place, Nir called to help us find the way and was very welcoming. The best part about the place is the beautiful beach nearby

This is a quite and lovely place, where you can rest and enjoy the near beach . You can cook your own food if you want to stay out of the crowded entertainment places. The clear and simple design of the studio is also a rest for the eyes and the mind.
Pleasant, good value, VERY close to a nice beach.

The accomodation was comfortable, clean, quiet, with a small garden and a Mini-kitchen. It is very close to a long, quiet wild beach. We were there at Jom Kippur, a good place  to be when  everything stands still in Israel. Lying  in a Kibbuz at a Beach it is very difficult to find. After crossing the bridge behind Atlit you have to turn left passing  through a new construction area until  you reach the yellow barrier of the Kibbuz. Outside of holidays it could be a bit noisy.
great place

Nir's place is lovely.
The hospitality was great and the place was very clean.
The beach is perfect!
4 minutes walk and very suitable for small children (there is a very nice lagoon in the northern part of the beach).
One small thing that has nothing to do with Nir, the kibbutz itself is very poorly maintained so if you're interested in a kibbutz experience, this is not the place for you.
Besides, everything was perfect!
Toda Nir & Hamutal :-)
Excellent place for small families, looking for a beach bargain
Very nice place, beautiful hospitality, generous owners. It was very welcoming. Few min from the beach! We will definitely come back!
A cozy place close to a beautiful beach! The hosts are really nice and helpful

Everthing was absolutely perfect. Nir's place is located just a few minutes walk from the beautiful beach. The location is great, near by Haifa and the Carmel mountain. Nir is very friendly and my boys and I loved his sweet little dogs. Thank you Nir (:
Most amazing Hosts! We were speechless about their kindness and hospitality! And of course we enjoyed the sea ;)
reviews.response:
Thanks Hadar for your kind words :-) it was our pleasure to meet your lovely family
and hope to see you on your next vacation in Israel
Take Care

reviews.comments: this is our third or fourth stay here - as always, we had a great time. the sweetest little house at the best location! will come again next year.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
This is a beatiful place to stay. The apartment is very well entertained and the hosts are very friendly.

reviews.comments: We spent two nights at Nir's place and enjoyed it a lot. The house is just a short walk from a beautiful beach. Nir is super friendly and a caring host.

The small private apartment with a graden in Neve Yam is the perfect place to spend a relaxing holiday. The beach is a few minutes walking distance through the kibbutz and the location is perfect, very calm and relaxing. Nir and Hamotal were very nice and helpful with everything, they made our stay truly amazing!
The apartment was spotless clean and fully equiped with all that you need. The calm green garden is the cherry on top! Will be happy to return in the future...
Perfect Location for a timeout, perfect beach, lonely sunsets, way out of the busy towns. Nir helped us with everything.
היה נחמד מאוד להתארח אצל ניר בראש השנה. הדירה שלו שימשה אותנו מאוד וניר ואשתו מאוד נחמדים ותקשורתיים!

It was really great staying at Nir's place! The room was clean and nice, had a nice outdoor sitting setting and the location is perfect - 5 minutes walk from the beach.
Hamotal greeted us and offered some nice soup she made, and both of the hosts were very niceand helpful during our stay.

Great value for money, Highly recommended!

Great place, Great hosts!
We only "tasted" Nir's place for a few days, which so nuch fun and welcoming.
Right on the nicest beach, lovely home-like place & a garden.
Ori
This is the second time we are staying here, and it was great again - beautiful place, with everything you need for a great beach vacation.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Our stay at Nir's studio apartment was lovely and everything we expected. It's a clean and compact apartment, properly equipped for cooking small meals (with electric stove and microwave), and a quite little garden, to have breakfasts in.
The location is ideal, a 3 minute walk from Neve Yam beach - one of the nicest beaches I've been to in Israel (peaceful and clean), which has its own little natural lagoon (!).

Nir is super friendly and provided us with great tips.
The location is excellent! 2 minutes from the beach.
The place had every thing we needed and looked just like it shown in the pictures.
Looking forward to coming back again soon.

We spent a beautiful week at Nir's accommodation. The flat is nicely decorated, clean and equipped well. There is a cute garden with a table ready for nice dinners and relaxing evenings. The beach is close (5 minutes walking) and is one of the nicest in Israel. Nir and his family hosted us like family and we enjoyed talking to them. Next year in Jerusalem? No, next year in Neve Yam!

We had a wonderful time at the studio. Nir and hamotal are lovely and very welcoming! We came with our two daughters (2yrs, and 3months), the older one enjoyed petting nir's dogs and cats, we went to see the horses and feed the goats at the neighbors' house, saw guinea pigs, and another neighbor invited us to jump on his trampoline. The beach is beautiful and we spent there great time. The kibutz seems to neglect it's public facilities which is a bit sad for such a beautiful place. During the stay we went to see "ramat hanadiv" botanical gardens located 20min away by car. We had wonderful time and we just look for our next opportunity to go out for such a vacation.
The host (nir and his wife) are very nice and friendly people, who were always thete for us. The place is quiet and warm, which gives you a feeling of privacy.

Nir and Hamutal made us feel welcome from the first minute when they picked us up at the train stop, drove us places we wanted to go and shared their delicious home cooked food with us.

Spring is the perfect time to visit their beautiful area where we got to take nature walks surrounded by green. They even let us borrow their bicycles with which we explored the area.

We also enjoyed the company of their many friendly dogs and cats who roam the court yard that connects the two housings.

Nir was a wonderful host, with a lovely and hospitable place.
less than a minute from the beautiful beach
reviews.response: Thanks Omri

reviews.comments:
We had the best time in Nir's place ! The apartment is very nice and clean with a nice yard to drink coffee or eat breakfast in. It's very close to the beach (which is beautiful !!) and the Kibutz itself is quiet and lovely. Nir and his family were very nice and welcoming and even allowed us to bring our dog :)
If you're looking for a calm, quiet and simple vacation, we warmly recommend!

Great location, clean and renovated studio! Nir and his wife were very nice and welcoming.
But, it should be noted that there's a kindergarten right outside the back door, so it's pretty noisy until about 14:00. The railway passes close to that part of the kibbutz, which adds to the noise. The bed is a foldable one (that turns into a sofa).
Having said that, we had a great time in this studio, and the beautiful and really close beach made our vacation great. We just felt we should inform other travellers so they won't be surprised.

We had a  great time at Nir's studio. the place is very very close to a most beautiful beach, Nir is a great host which makes one feel welcome and comfortable immediately.  The studio has a back yard which is very convenient. we will Def. come and stay at this property again.

we had a wonderful time. Nir's place is basic but well planned and has anything you need for a great beach vacation. Nir and his family were very welcoming and attentive to all our needs.
The beach at Neve Yam is beautiful and peaceful.

What a great place. Clean, stylish and a quick walk from the beach. We stayed 2 nights with our 2 daughters. There is a very nice back yard. Nir and his wife are wonderful hosts and helped us with everything we needed and more.
We will definitely return.

We had the best time at nir's lovely studio at Rosh hashana. nir and hamotal was very wellcoming hosts.
The studio was nice and clean,had things we need.
The most fun was to walk two minutes to the beautiful beach.
We will be happy come again.

We were unconventional guests..and Nir was very understanding and welcoming.The studio was nice,clean and well designed.the beautiful  beach is 2 minutes walk from the room and that is the greatest advantage

התארחנו לילה אחד- זוג עם ילדה , ניר היה זמין להסברי הגעה, המלצות ונענה לכל בקשה.
המקום היה נעים מאוד, נקי ומוקפד, מצויד בכל מה שצריך לבישול בסיסי, רחצה ושינה.
הגינה האחורית מקסימה ובילינו בה חלק גדול מהזמן.
הקיבוץ שקט ומאפשר ניתוק והכי כייף שבהליכה קצרה וקלה של מספר דקות הגענו לחוף הים
בטוח חוזרים!

We’ve stayed at Nir’s lovely studio for 3 nights, and had the best time. Cozy and clean room with a large backyard. 5 minutes’ walk from a beautiful beach, and to top things up, an amazing family that made us feel at home from the minute we arrived.
Welcoming and easy going hosts that will take care of everything you need. Highly recommended.
Hope to see you again soon. Rinat and Amalia
we had a great time at nir's place. the room was clean and cosy, very comfortable and exactly for our needs! if you are looking for a nice place 3 minutes from a beautiful beach - go to Neva Yam.

the studio is 2 minutes walking from the beach.

reviews.comments: Nir was fantastic and helped us with everything we needed during our stay.  The suite/studio apartment is great, clean and exactly like pictures.  The apartment is literally a 2min walk through the kibbutz to one of the best beaches in Israel - and there you can just relax on the beach and swim or take a beautiful long walk up the coast - spectacular!!  We will for sure be coming back and for longer next time!
יחידה קטנה ואסטתית בנווה ים.  מרחק הליכה מהחוף.  מצוין למי שמחפש שקט וגישה ישירה לים.  ניר זמין לכל שאלה.
החדר לחופשה מהחלומות. מאד נקי, 5 דקות הליכה לים, שקט ושלווה. מיקום מצוין לטיולים ובילויים. ניר וחמוטל נותנים את ההרגשה שממש חשוב להם שנהנה. ממליצים בחום ומקווים לחזור בקרוב.
הדירה שקטה ונקיה. קרובה לים, מארחים אדיבים ומסבירי פנים. בקיצור מומלץ.

חמוטל וניר מארחים מקסימים, חמים ונגישים, שגרמו לנו להרגיש בנוח.
היחידה מקסימה, מרווחת, מוארת ונקייה, מים חמים בשפע, מטבח מאובזר ונחמד.
אהבנו במיוחד את הגינה הפרטית ואת הקרבה לחוף הים (דקות ספורות של הליכה). למי שאוהב לבלות בים, היחידה הזאת מומלצת במיוחד.
חמוטל היתה מקסימה במיוחד ופינקה אותנו בתבשילים טעימים מעשי ידיה לפני שנפרדנו.

יחידה נעימה, מרווחת, מאוד נקייה ומסודרת, מושקעת גם בדברים הקטנים (פירות על השולחן, מראת גוף! כריות נוחות, מטבח מאובזר). החצר פרטית ושקטה והכי הכי, מרחק הליכה קצר לים! חוף נעים שיש בו גם סככות ומציל .
המחיר גבוה באופן יחסי לדירות מהסוג הזה אבל התמורה מלאה.
אנחנו ממליצים!

אירוח מקסים, מאוד נהננו
חמוטל וניר מארחים מעולים 👍🏻

המקום של ניר וחמוטל בנווה ים מקסים, נעים, נקי, בטוח , עם פטיו ירוק, קסום במיוחד בערב כשהכוכבים והשקט באים במלוא הדרם.
הקרבה לים (כמה דקות הליכה) מנצחת, חוף יפה וידידותי עם לאגונה משגעת ביופיה ובאוצרותיה התת מימיים!

הסטודיו של ניר חמוד, יפה, נקי, נעים ומזמין, מואר, קרוב מאוד לים, החצר מקסימה, והכנסת האורחים היא מעל ומעבר. מה עוד אפשר לבקש?
משפחה מקסימה! יחידה נקייה ונעימה באיזור שקט ליד הים, מומלץ מאוד!

יחידה קטנה, מתאימה בדיוק לצרכים של זוג, הגינה מקסימה ונעימה, הכינו לנו מגבות נוספות לים. מרחק הליכה מחוף הים. ניר נתן הרבה מידע לגבי מסעדות ומקומות באיזור. היה כיף. בטוח נחזור:)

reviews.comments:
