description: Colorful and cozy housing-unit, located across a big garden with large Pecan trees, hammocks and wooden play-house. Recently renovated and refurnished, with large windows and surrounded by trees. Kids are welcome to play and enjoy the various adventures that our garden ofers...Situated on the green-covered hills of Tivon, Close to Haifa & Nazareth, in short walking distance from restaurants and public transport. Perfect for families, couples, and business travelers.The spaceRecently renovated and refurnished, it has a new, clean, happy feeling to it. Colurful and full of light. Comfortable kitchen equiped with everything you need for cooking (Microwave, Toster-oven, electric .Guest accessBesides the housing-unit (living-room and kithcen, bedroom, bathroom) you are welcome to the upper garden (wooden-house and hammock) and the lower garden (quiet space below big trees).
interaction: We love to meet new people! Our home is across the garden, so we are available and happy to help with anything you may need. And if you have kids - send them over...  our kids are always happy to meet new friends  ;-)
transit: Our place is a 5 minute walk from the bus station. There is a supermarket and two restaurants just down the road.

reviews.comments: This is a wonderful little space--cheerful, full of amenities. Hosts were lovely, attentive and quick to respond. The garden is beautiful and the beds were comfortable.
A nice place to stay in Tiv'on.  We were there just overnight, but the space was very affordable and very convenient as a base between Galilee and Acco and Haifa.

If you are visiting the north or Israel with little kids.  This is where you should stay.  Ruth’s apartment had games, toys, books, a high chair and more. They invited us to use their outdoor toys, play with their kids, etc... Incredible hosts.
Great place, wonderful family. Highly recommend.
Great place, and wonderful family. Thanks for the warm welcome.

This is a nice suite for a person visiting the area.  The apartment is well  equipped.  The area is quite rural with a good amount of greenery.  The yard surrounding the suite is somewhat messy with a lot of discarded or old items   including an old sofa which detracts from the quality of the place.

Very unique and lovely small home nestled into a wonderful neighborhood.   If you have a car, this is a very special place to stay--the description is accurate, one feels like one is outside in the woods with the wraparound windows.  The kitchen is nicely equipped and the bathroom and shower modern.   The bed was one of the most comfortable I have experienced in my travels.

Nice place for families. Ruth and Omer are very nice.
Well situated to stay at the same place and visit Haifa, Akko and Nazareth.
Comfortable, enough space for 4 persons.Nice Garden, free parking in front of the apartment. Quiet and good located. Supermarket in walking distance
Great place, very clean the hosts were very friendly. Location is great for every one wants to travel to Lower Galil. Very recommended!!!!

Very nice place, close by to the town center, loved the yard and the toys my girls could play with.

Host is very thoughtful, everything you need is right in the room: coffee and milk, oven, microwave, fridge and stove top.

Cute apartment in a little house in the back garden. Fantastic esp. for families with kids aged 0-10, since the hosts’ kids have a yard full of toys, swings etc. which they shared generously. Friendly, relaxed and helpful hosts. Kiryat Tiv’on is a good base for day trips all around.

The place is very nice,
There's a bedroom and a couch that turns into a bad in the living room, both are double beds and comfortable.
The bathroom access is through the bedroom.
Everything was clean and nothing was missed.
Our daughter really liked the nice toys and books available in the cabin.
outside in the yard shared with ruth and her family there's a hammock and a tree house and all is realy nice and welcoming for children.
Ruth and omer where very nice.
In my opinion it's a very good cost to value place to stay.

Great place to stay, especially for kids. Very clean and well equiped apartment with all you need and more, and a magical yard with lots of attraction for kids. Warm and welcoming hospitality also noteworthy. Highly recommended

We arrived late in the evening with our two little children. When we arrived the place was cosy, warm, welcoming and organized. The communication was good and fast. Each time we asked about something, Ruti and Omer did their best to help us. Our children enjoyed the place a lot.
We really enjoyed our short stay at Ruth's. the communication was great, perfect location, and exactly what I needed for the kids to feel at home away from home.

It was the PERFECT PLACE for us. The house is absolutely beautiful. Our kids loved the toys and the garden with the little hut. Ruth and Omer were so friendly and helped us with everything. It felt like home to us and it was hard to leave again. Our boys loved to play with their kids and we received the most delicious home-made cookies! We had our own washing machine and could even use their private dryer on a daily basis. By rental car, we could also reach other places in Israel easily, like Haifa, the Kinneret, Jerusalem, etc. We'd love to stay again in this beautiful house!!

The apartment was great - a lot of space, clean and beautifully arranged and thoughtfully equipped. The bed was very comfortable, and so was the kitchen.  Ruth was very communicative, attentive and willing to help.  We enjoyed our stay there very much, recommend it and would absolutely come again. Zeev

My family of four (kids 1 and 4) spent two nights at Ruth and Omer's beautiful house. The kids had a great time playing in the shaded yard and the house was fully equipped with everything we needed, including a high chair and pack n' play. Ruth and Omer were very welcoming, as were their children. Highly recommended for a family stay!
A beautiful spot - very recommended! Ruth was very communicative and helpful. She offered information about the area and provided us with anything we needed.

our stay war absoluteness perfect!!! great place, very nice family. they gave us much more then they should have. Very generous people.
The garden is so welcoming and fun for kids to play at. and also the house has everything you need and more... highly recommended :)))
Nice place, great garden! The kids realy loved
Wonderful place!

We stayed at Ruth’s place during our vacation. The unit is lovely, clean and well equipped with everything you need to make your stay pleasant. The couple were attentive and quickly treated every request or questions of ours. Very recommend place.

A wonderful apartment at one of the most nature-loving cities in Israel. Welcoming, gracious hosts that really cared about our comfort and made us feel at home. Highly recommended, great value for your money.

Our one-night stay at Ruti & Omer's lovely home was absolutely a dream. We truly wished it could be longer. The house itself is beautiful, cosy, well-designed, with good spaces for a small family, with an AMAZING backyard that is a dream for both children as well as adults; wooden toys, a house on a tree, chickens, huge pecan and walnuts trees that give beautiful fruit, shade and a whole lot of green. Like a little dream village. We were with our toddler, and all was super comfortable and fun, Tivon itself is green and quiet.  Although we did not get to meet Omer and Ruti, they left us all we needed and were available via phone. We highly recommend this Airbnb place. We will surely come back and for a longer period. It was way too short for such a great place.

Ruth and her husband were happy to ensure we had what we needed and were fun to chat with in the common garden.
The location is close to Yokenam and Haifa and has good access to major roads with access to the Galil, Emek Yizrael, and Rd 6 to the center of the country.
I highly recommend Ruth's Place and I'm looking forward to staying there in the future.

we also came with a large dog who was welcomed with love.
finally, we had a wonderful stay and we would warmly recommend it!

הגינה עצמה גדולה ומלאת משחקים לילדים והיא היתה האטרקציה, אם כי נדרשה השגחה צמודה על הילדים בזמן משחק מאחר וחלק מהמתקנים לא נראו הכי בטיחותיים וכן הושארו חפצים חדים ומסוכנים באיזורים מסוימים.

description: It's particulary gratifying when you return to it, worn-out and after a day of exploring the ins and outs of the city and its surroundings. A HOME, that will definitely load you up with fresh and enlivening energy.Centrally located only 60 m' from the Bahai Gardens.You'll have a hard time leaving this elegant modern and beautiful apartment.The spaceMy deceased parantes Eleonora and Herman loved hosting people, this apartment was always full of guests. They were known for their generousity and their kind hearts. I miss them a lot. For more than 2 years this apartment was empty, I could not touch it. I recently renovated this apartment, designed it and made it modern, elegant, beautiful and  very cosy. It is very clean, and welcoming, I'm sure they would have loved it, as all our guests and visitors told. This is my Airbnb apartment, which I personally care for with all my heart.Guest accessall parts exept one cupboard which is a storage space for the apartment like soaps, towels, tools etcOther things to noteThis apartment is in a very good condition, it's aesthetic, clean and welcoming. I am going to be availiable to whatever questions that arises. In the apartment there is a house manual available which gives all the needed information to enjoy your stay. additional_house_rules:
When you leave home pls switch off the electrical appliances to avoid high expenses. 
We expect our guests to treat our home with care  and leave it clean and neat for our next guests, especially when long term guest are hosted. 
It's very important to us that our guest are considerate to our neighbours and that they do not play loud music or or tv.
Quiet hours are between 23:00 - 08:00 
Pls. No moving furniture or redesigning the apartment. Israeli guests, Please be aware as israeli law requires you must add 17% VAT.

interaction: I will be available to questions or needed information and if I can I will socialize with them

Great location! Josephine was prompt and very helpful. I recommend this place if you are traveling to Haifa.

I would absolutely stay at Josephine’s place again next time in Haifa!

Perfect Location, clean & very responsive caring host.

Josephine is thoughtful , fantastic and helpful host.
The place was sparkling clean and tidy with her very nice touch.
She prepared a crib with all what is needed for our baby, including toys.
The place is in a great location with a walking distance to the German colony. Josephine made our life so much easier by giving us a local tip of a parking lot close to the apartment.
She is very responsive and quick yet she gives space in very elegant way.
She was very generous leaving us wine, bread, fruits, milk, chocolate and even a food pouch for our baby.
For us Josephine is a super host and we recommend her place.
Great apartment, amazing location steps away from Bahai gardens and several restaurants, etc. Great place to stay in Haifa and would definitely stay here again.

The apartment is very bright, clean and roomy with great amenities. Location is ideal; just one block from the lower terrace of the Bahai Gardens and next to German colony. We spent three nights there and it was so nice to come to this comfortable space after each of the long days out. Josephine was a very good host; very responsive; would check in with us regularly to make sure everything ok. We spent 13 days in Israel
One caveat is that the apartment is in a multi-story building and is not well marked; so have to communicate well prior to check in to find.

Josephine's lovely apartment is just steps from the base of the terrace gardens to the Bahai shrine, and nearby many great restaurants in the German Colony neighborhood. She is such a kind, generous, responsive host. Very best!

Apartment was very clean and in a really great location. The apartment is set back from the street so it was also very quiet. We had a very pleasant stay; it's clear that Josepha takes great pride in taking care of her family apartment and values making it available to guests.
For Baha'i travelers of 2 or 3 this place is perfect. The location is a very short walk from the bottom terraces, and close to Ben Gurion for easy access to restaurants.

reviews.comments:
Josephine is a super host. The Apartment exceeded our expectations in terms of cleanliness, location, and amenities.
Thanks a lot ❤️

Fantasitc stay at Josephine's. Location is perfect for exploring the city and getting in/and of Haifa (just a 15 minute walk to the train station). Right in the German Colony with all its restaurants. Fully renovated apartment with 2 bedrooms - it has everything that you would possibly need for a comfortable stay. Josephine went far and beyond to make sure we felt welcome. We will definitely stay again when we are back to visit the beautiful Haifa.

We enjoyed our visit very much.
The place is amazing and in a great location.
The place was crystal clean and Josepha made sure that all our requests are fulfilled before our arrival so that our experience will be as smooth as possible.
Also we really liked all the small touches that Josepha has put into the apartment before our visit.
The cribs we asked were extra cushy, warm and inviting, there were toys lying ready for the kids to play and other such small gestures that indicate that the host cares and does this with love.
Josepha is super responsive with an average response time of maybe 1 minute before and during our visit.
She is super helpful and makes you feel comfortable to reach her for anything.
She also gave us a lot of recommendations about things that we can do in the area.
This is the best Airbnb experience I had so far and I'm using airbnb often.
I absolutely recommend.
Amazing hospitality ! Out and beyond our expectations to make us feel comfortable
Josepha is the best ever host I have seen. Everything is thought in the details. Great location, the apartment is cosy and perfectly sparkling.  We have spent a wonderful trip in this place.
reviews.response: Thank you so much for being such fabulous guests and for leaving the apartment so clean and neat. It was a pleasure coming back to it.

reviews.comments: If you need a place to stay in Haifa look no further! Josepha is a wonderful host - very open communicator and keen that her guests enjoy their stay offering tips and recommendations and seeking out any information requested. Lovely apartment, spotlessly clean and great location.
reviews.response: Thank you very very much you’re a lovely family

reviews.comments:
Spontaneously we arranged a vacation in Haifa and Giuseppe's apartment immediately caught our eye. Renovated, spacious, in a great location, pleasant terrace. Giuseppe answered quickly and was kind in her answers and answered all our questions, a family with two toddlers. She took care of every detail, that the children would be safe, pleasant, fun and protected.
When we arrived we saw new dolls, games, a set for food, everything new in preparation for us. Protected electrical outlets and moved the fragile and delicate furniture to another room,
So that our children will have a safe play space. We really appreciate the thought and investment!
Thank you!

Lovely apartment, everything very new. Conveniently located for visiting at the Italian Hospital, and right next door to the Baha'i gardens.

Josepha is a kind and attentive host who really looks after her guests. I warmly recommend both her and her apartment.

Fully equipped, spacious  apartment in a great location.  The host is quick to respond, helpful with suggestions, and helped make a special stay. Highly recommended !

Great value and location, close to the port and all tourist attractions. Awesome find!
Great stay

Highly recommended !!!

על כל פרט הקטן שתייר יכול להזדקק. דירה סופר נקייה ,עם מטבח מאובזר ,פטיו חמוד עם נדנדה,מזגן בכל חדר ,פרטיות ושקט

description: 2 room apartment on beautiful Haifa beach. Haifa Promenade below the building and restaurants too. Cable HD FlatTV with channels for kids and different languages support like Russian, free Wi-Fi, Air Conditioner, Fully Equipped Kitchen, Free Parking. Close to bus stop and the train. Easy access to main touristic routs. Fresh linen and towels, free tea, coffee, sugar, etc. Easy access to Yama, Rambam hospital, Carmel Center and Bahai gardens. Near entrance to Carmel tunnels and MATAM.The spaceRenovated apartment with new parquet floor.Big parents room with a new Double Bed and a huge closet and in the other room the sofa could be opened to a bed if needed. 2 Cable HD TV in both rooms with hundreds of channels including kids channels, sports channels and channels in different languages (for example Russian channels).The walls are decorated with beautiful hand-painted oil paintings which gives the place a peaceful feeling. The kitchen is fully equipped including electric stove, stove ventilator, cooking pots, coffee, tea and more.Guest accessYou can use everything that you see in the apartment.Other things to noteThe building is basically the only licensed building in Haifa that is on the beach. It's a huge building with around 300 hundreds rooms and 16 floors. The building has a doorman, small cafe within the building, restaurants, huge balcony, water park right outside the building, sports room, convention room and more.
interaction: You can write me in any language that you want. I'll translate and answer you promptly. I'm a rather new host on airbnb. My strategy is to give the best possible customer service in order to receive quick 5 stars feedbacks that will give my guests confidence to continue visiting me. You can ask me questions about Israel and Haifa. If you need recommendations for places to visit, restaurants, places to go out or anything else please feel free to talk to me 24/7.
transit: Bus- to the north of the buildingTaxi- Within the building there is a phone that you only need to pick up (no dialing) and call for a cab.Train- 1.2 km to the south of the building.Car- free parking. The building has easy exit to Haifa main road and Haifa tunnels.Walk- Haifa's beautiful Boardwalk on the beach.

3 of us stayed in eyal's place for a long weekend in haifa. the apartment was in a great location with a beautiful view directly on the carmel beach. the beaches are fantastic and there is a promenade (tayelet) with cafes/ bars/ restaurants along the beach. we found free parking directly in front of the building every day/ night, but there is also a parking garage under the building for a fee if you can't find a spot (the beach gets busy especially on the weekends). the apartment including linens were clean. kitchenette small but very functional for making breakfasts, including a small fridge and hot plate/ stove. super quiet (except the occasional shout from the lifeguards at the beach below, i think they start at 8am?). building and apartment are a bit 'dated' as others have said, but still clean and functional. eyal was a great host with super easy check-in and -out.

Downstairs you can find a beautiful promenade with restaurants next to one of the most beautiful beaches in israel. Great location for a vacation.

The apartment was very clean, yet a little bit run-down. Very hot water in the bath and good air conditioning - both available if you like. The communication with Eyal was excellent. It has a separate bedroom with full double bed and ample cupboard space, a lounge with a double sofa which turns into a bed, and a fully equipped kitchen. There is an additional mattress for a third child. The porch is an extra outdoor room with table and chairs and a peaceful view of the fields. The bathroom has a comfortable shower but no bath.Other things to note1. description: Our private cute and separate room is ready for you. It's the only room in our second floor of our house, with separate entrance, and very nice balcony so you'll be able to enjoy privacy. We live on the first floor and ready to assist you any time.The spaceIts a cute and cool gallery. We have one large bed built by us and based on pallets. The entire room contains hand made art unique paintings. The room has separate entrance with no need for interaction with us. It best fit for young spirit travelers and couples. We can also provide you with additional mattress if you'll need it for a child. There's a new kitchen installed and a fridge!Guest accessGuests will have access to the second floor only and can use also the nice roof. The roof has table, chairs and even removable hammock. The room contains a bathroom with shower only for guests usage.Excellent Israeli breakfasts (!!!) can be found 100meters from our place in a beautiful coffee/restaurant place called "Alto", and there's also an original Georgian restaurant serving mostly dinner in a unique spirit.During the summer our Kibbutz swimming pool in open (end of May to beginning of September) for some 15$ per person.Other things to noteThe room equipped with a new kitchen, refrigerator and all you need to arrange yourself a fine meal. We will clean the room and well prepare it properly before your arrival.

We respect guests understanding that the room is separate but part of our house. We live in a calm and quite community and guests should behave properly. We prefer guests with no pets. 
The entire house is non smoking and so as the room. Guests can smoke on the balcony as they wish. 
We ask guests to keep the room as they got it.
interaction: We love hosting guest and you'll feel it. You can interact with us anytime and we'll help you. We can also assist you to get along and travel in the beautiful Galilee. We are home during most of the time and if we're not there a friend of ours will be available.
transit: Public transportation is available mainly from the nearest city Akko. We have parking place near the house for those coming by car. If you're coming strait from the AIRPORT - the best is to take a direct train to Akko (less than 2 hours) and from Akko better to take a taxi to Shomrat. It will take some 5-10 minutes (some 8$).

reviews.comments: Great clean place with great hospitality.
Our family  had a great pleasure to stay at Amir's place. It's very quite, cozy and authentic. We'll return if we'll want to travel in the Western Galilee.
nice size room with a sweet terrace.  Amir was very responsive to all of our needs. It was a short drive to the old city of Akko.

A cosy place with great outdoor space. Apartment was very clean and had everything we needed for cooking and being comfortable. Amir is a great host who helped us with great tips about hiking and dining. I would love to stay there again!
We had a lovely stay in this cozy and homey studio. Amir was super responsive and helpful.

Amir’s place offers a perfect kibbutz stay. It was a great central location, close to everything for daily activities but felt remote enough that if we wanted to hang home for s few hours on a lazy rainy afternoon we had no regret. Amir and his family are very lovely and give great tips about the area. A wonderful slice of Israeli life to experience. Would happily go back anytime.
Very comfortable place close to many local attractions. Amir's local tips were great
Very nice and clean place, good vibe

Peaceful, convenient spacious studio with private terrace, amazing dawn chorus of native birds. Amir & Sharon are responsive hosts. You do need a car or take bus; would be a long walk to Akko.

There is hairdryer, instant coffee and tea, sugar, hot plate and small refrigerator. Also foam couch where 3rd person could sleep.

Highly recommend kibbutz Giat Dairy café, good value and nutritious large, interesting meals - for breakfast go early (8am) or make reservation. Small kibbutz grocery is well stocked and fair prices for snacks, produce, cheese, etc. A great AirBnb!
Amir and Sharon were such considerate and caring hosts.  We truly enjoyed our stay and look forward to a return visit.

Amir's place was our first kibbutz experience. His room is a spacious separate apartment built on top of his house with a private entrance, kitchen and bath. It's location is super convenient to downtown Akko and Old Town, yet it feels rural, being in the middle of agricultural land. There is a huge patio with hammocks. The bed is on 4" pallets on the floor and the mattress is very comfortable. There is a cafe 100 yards from Amir's house where we had a spectacular "Israeli Breakfast." Amazing. It is worth noting that this community is gated and it can be a little complicated getting the gates open. That problem can be circumvented if you are willing to walk 150 yards to the parking lot on the other side of the gates. If you are lucky, you may get Amir's friend, Amachai, to tell you the story of the founding of the community. It's quite a story.
Last minute request and he responded quickly. A bit isolated. Great place for breakfast just in front. Internet slow. Place is clean and quiet in a kibbutz. Recommended if need a place in the area.

Amir was very accommodating when we stayed in the studio during Shabbat. He gave us a hot plate and a flexible check out time so that we could comfortably observe Shabbat. The space was as described-spacious, comfortable, beautifully decorated, and private. The kibbutz is quiet, gorgeous, and five minutes away from Acre. A wonderful retreat without having to venture too far from civilization!

The room is spacious and very comfortable.
If you are looking for a relaxing time it is just a great option!
There is a hammock you can use.
Amir and his family were really helpful all the time!
I really recommend it!

Staying at Amir's was great. the place was charming and Amir and his wife were very accommodating and generous, and you get great value for your price. When we come back to the western Galilee, we'll surely try to stay at their place.

The kibbutz is beautiful and quiet, a great place to relax. The studio is nicely set up with a small kitchen and sleeping area, and the big balcony with a hammock was perfect for reading or hanging out. Everything in the studio was neat, tidy and in working condition, and Amir was very available and responsive to any questions. He also came up to give us some tips on nearby places to hike and go to the beach, which I really appreciated.

We had a lovely stay at Amir and Sharon's studio in Shomrat. On our first night we arrived very late coming from the airport but Amir waited for us to make sure we got in ok and we're comfortable. The studio is private and the rooftop is great with a very nice view. Hope to come back soon
Great place. Make sure to try the Goat Dairy Cafe/Restaurant as soon as you can. Just trust me;)

Amir's place is in a beautiful kibbutz just outside Akko. He and his wife were very helpful, giving us tips on the area and where to go.  The room was nicely appointed with original artwork. Clean hot shower and private entrance.  The breakfast at the  cafe where they use the kibbutz's  fresh goat milk butter and artisanal cheese was the best we ever had (and that is not hyperbole).  We are looking forward to a longer stay in the future.

Amir and Sharon made us feel extremely welcome. They live on a beautiful kibbutz outside the city of Akko. Amir described to us in detail what kibbutz life is like and we learned a lot from our conversations. Amir also suggested some great activities for us to do -- both on the kibbutz and in the Galilee area. We enjoyed a beautiful private room with its own entrance with a small view of the sea! We also had access to a gorgeous private roof/balcony with table, chairs and a hammock for enjoying tea in the evening. They are first-class hosts - we loved our time on Kibbutz Shomrat!
Great location, very nice pool
wonderful place
We had a wonderful time at Amir's place. Besides the great experience at the apartment, it was super covenient to all of the beaches and attractions in the area. Amir was very attentive to our needs.

I had a wonderful vacation at Amir's place. The studio is cozy, quiet and peaceful with everything you might need. The best part is a very lovely private terrace. The beach is a 10-minute drive away. Don't miss Alto Cafe which is  just around the corner from the studio. All in all, great value for money.
Nice place in the kibbutz on the roof of the house

Everything was great- the apartment is in great condition, very clean, fully equipped. Amir is a great host, very kind and responsive.
The area is quiet. I will be glad to use this accommodation on my next trip.

Amir's place is warm and cozy and in a wonderful location. Just what we needed.
We got great local tips and enjoyed our stay, and even got great blintzes one day!

Great value for money, recommended!
We had an amazing chilling vacation. Loved the outside, the sunset is viewed from the balcony and it was amazing. Small and cozzy place and a very large outside. Thanks for the stay :)

We enjoyed our stay at Amir's place.
The apartment looks better than in the pictures, decorated with love and taste. The care of the hosts was evident.

We really liked the outdoor seating area, and the hammock under the vines. perfect.

The apartment of Amir and Sharon is small but very cute and comfortable and has all one needs to have a special holiday in Israel. The hosts are great people and very helpful. We really felt at home and   encourage others to spend time in this apartment. The apartment is near Akko and Haifa and near to the sea, and is not too far to the sea of Galilee. This apartment is a little jewel  in a Kibbutz in the north of Israel!!

The house of Amir and his family is a nice place. We enjoyed our evenings on the huge terrace. We had a lovely welcome with pancakes and information about the area. The room is nicely decorated and it’s big enough for a family with a little child, but for 4 adults, it’s too small.

Awesome place -
There is a delightful mediterranean breeze all day at the balcony. The room itself is equipped with everything you need. Amir is a great host. Very recommended place.
A great studio with ‘soul’; a wonderfull outdoors where you can hang out & eat and the location is quit and close to visit all of the north coast. Recomended!
Such a peaceful and relax place. Such an amazing view and vibes. Recommend +++
Great place,  great hospitality,  great location, we arrived and were treated like family. Looking forward to coming back!!!

We had a super relaxed weekend. The terras was lovely. We enjoyd the kibouts and the local breakfast club ‘Alto’.
The place was very clean. And we slept perfect with the airconditioner.


Very happy we did this trip to Akko.

Amir was really helpful with very good tips for dinner and breakfast. He was very reactive with accurate information. The place is very clean, quiet and spacious. Great terrace to relax in the evening. Interesting to watch life in a kibboutz. I would recommand this place. Alexis

We had a lovely stay at Amir's place. The kibbutz is beautiful and quiet and we had a great time just walking in the lanes and getting lost. The location is excellent - 7 minutes from Akko, 10 minutes from the lovely Achziv beach and close to tons of beautiful nature spots. Amir's apartment was the perfect place to come back to after a long day of exploring the area - it was clean, homey and very welcoming. Thank you, Amir and Sharon! We will be happy to stay with you again in the future.

P.S - do not miss the lovely breakfast at Alto dairy farm (מחלבת אלטו), especially the Labaneh with the sourdough bread (-:
Excelent location for exploring western Galilee. Amir was very kind and the apartment is perfect.
Wonderful space and value with artsy and quaint vibes, loved the stay!

We enjoyed our stay mainly because of the very calm atmosphere, good breeze in the evenings and the convenient location with quick access to the western Galili attractions (city, sea, nature). The studio apartment is decently equipped - with the notable exception of a wardrobe or a chest of drawers which are missing. Amir is a good, friendly host and was quick to respond to any question.

We booked very spontaneously and were extremely grateful that Amir accommodated us at such short notice. We really felt welcomed at Amirs Airbnb. The apartment is nicely decorated, cosy, very clean and has a huge terrace one can use. Amir is a very thoughtful and helpful host. By car Akko and also Haifa can be reached easily. I definitely recommend staying here and would come back myself! Thanks once again Amir!
It’s a lovely apartment - we all slept well and the breakfast on the terrace was beautiful! It’s a beautiful area and we loved the little café with local produce just next to it.
nice and clean. Great value for money!
Everything was great!

We stayed in Amir's place for 7 days and it was a really good experience :). The apartment has everything you need (even if you want to cook) and Amir and his wife are just downstairs if you need something. There are a number of shops close to the place (5 mins by car).

I highly recommend the place for anyone who wants to visit North part of Israel and looking for a great (and relatively cheap) accommodation!
great
Our stay at Amir's place was nice and relaxing. we enjoyed it very much!!
This is a great place to stay. Well designed and Amir is super helpful. Everything is great and we would love to come again!
Very good accommodation, quiet, clean, superfriendly hosts, great Tipps, easy check-in. Very recommendable!

Our stay at Amir's was rather brief, being for just the one night, however the studio and it's location are lovely. Amir was also very friendly and easy to communicate with, making our stay very nice. I wish we could have stayed longer!

Comfortable and really nice appartment within a kibbutz near Acco. When you are travelling by car, this is your place. Really quiet and nice atmosphere. Don't forget to try the breakfast in the kibbutz restaurant!
Absoute recommendation.

It was great to stay with Amir, Sharon and their kids in Shomrat Kibbutz. The area is safe and quiet and just a few minutes drive from Akko. Amir and Sharon gave us great recommendations for the area and North of Israel and was helpful anytime. The apartment is nice and clean and offers everything you need. Definitely a great place to stay when visiting Akko.
Great stay with good recommendations and lovely hand picked tea from the garden! Must say
Amir's place is clean, stylish and has a great big balcony with a nice breeze. It is located about 15 minutes from Accra. The host is nice and sends helpful travel recommendations .
Amazing place to stay and have a whole outstanding "Kibbutz experience". Super caring hosts.

Amir's place was just what we were looking for! We wanted to have a quick trip to the north to get to know the area better. The house was in a perfect location really close to Akko village that is an incredible place. The place was very clean and with a lot of really nice small details. The kibbutz is also very organized and you can find things to make your stay more confortable. I would definitely recommend Amir's place to everyone that wants to visit Akko, Rosh Hanikra and sorroundings. Great place, great experience and a lot of nice memories!
The studio is just perfect. We loved the design, the many details, the terrace! The neighborhood in the kibbuz is quiet, Akko and various beaches are very close. Christina & Markus

Amir’s place is the best choice if you are looking for a relaxing and calm stopover. You won’t hear anything but birds as the house is situated in a kibbutz. We chilled in the hammock and had dinner on our private terrace. The house is built in a modern style and the interior is cozy and unique with a lot of details to discover. The apartment was very clean. We never met the hosts but the communication was perfect. The cherry on the cake would be a sharper kitchen knife, a kitchen towel and some newer towels ;) We would definitely recommend Amir’s place!
reviews.response: Thanks Alexsandra for the review. We now renewed the towels we provide to guests. Sharp knife was there but hidden I guess... We made it opfront. Thanks for helping us serve better. Amir

reviews.comments: Amir was a really nice and caring host who always helped us with any questions. The location was great with a really nice rooftop terrace. It was very clean and had everything we needed. I can really recommend this place!

Even though for just one night, we had a great stay in Amir's home. The studio was clean and had all we needed (a big and spacious terrace that allowed for us to catch some sunshine!), and just a short drive away from pretty Akko. It was a great experience to stay with a local in a Kibbutz, be personally welcomed by Amir and hear his stories about Kibbutz life now and in the past. Definitely recommend!

Great studio with a perfect Terrasse in a nice and quiet kibbutz. The Baha'i gardens are just around the corner, which is great. Otherwise there is not much to do in the kibbutz, but that was the reason why we went there ;)
Very nice and quite place. Clean and comfortable room. Very good restaurants closeby. We spend a great time and hope to come back.
It was our 2nd visit to Amir's place in Shomrat, this time to try the skydive center of the kibbutz. Great second stay, thank you again Amir for your hospitality!

A grate place....
We gatt a picefall quit place
We had a grate time
Amir's place is exactly what we were looking for. The place is clean and very comfortable. We will come back for sure.
This is a very cute and comfortable small apartment with a great balcony, hammock and view of nature. Great surroundings, very quiet and the Kibbutz is welcoming. Had a very relaxing stay.
This place is just amazing, a short drive from Akko (2km) and you are staying in a great spot. Amir and Sharon are really nice and welcoming. The rooftop and the studio is great. Don't think twice !

We really enjoyed staying at Sharon and Amirs place. They gave us some really good recommendations to explore the area (try out banana beach). The rooftop terrace is wonderful. It was possible to get our laundrey in the Kibbuz for a very fair price done. It is very useful to have a car when you are planning to stay there.
היה נחמד מאוד, המקום היה מאוד נקי ומסודר כמו שציפינו.
Thank you so much, Sharon and Amir, for the good time and the good tea in Shomrat. It was a pleasure to be there. The terrasse was so lovely. A perfect accomodation!
It was lovely!
Nice place

Communication with Amir was easy and always received a fast response.
He even agreed to let us in a bit earlier, as we were there already.
He explained everything nicely and gave us recommendations about where and what we can do around.
Place was clean and as described, quiet and relaxing.
Will definitely recommend the place!
- the appartement is really great and very close to Akko (by car). Amir has been very nice and we had a great breakfast in the kibbutz. We hope to come back soon.
Amir is really welcoming and helpful. The place is beautiful and really quiet. Perfect !

We stayed at Amir's place after a few days in Tel Aviv. Wow - what a tranquil and beautiful space to relax. The terrace was spacious and lovely with a hammock and grape vines providing some extra shade while we ate breakfast outside. We would definitely stay here again - Amir was very responsive and we appreciated the cleanliness of the apartment!
A beautiful place, don't think twice!

The place is a kind of little penthouse on a private villa within the Kibbutz, used as a private artist's atelier decorated with paintings and work in progress, otherwise as a place for guests. Tranquil and very well equipped it makes a lovely stay near the historic town of Akko and its beaches. It is in close walking distance to the Baha'i gardens (Bahji), i.e. a perfect place for Baha'is who want to stay in the Akka area. Amir is there for you 24/7, arrival is possible practically any time, reliable and easy. Great hospitality spirit of the the family. I had some special wishes which were fulfilled happily by Amir and more than I expected. You have full privacy with separate entrance and huge terrace with sun protection. Large and very comfortable mattrass, good comforter, very nice and light bathroom. electric shutters, ceiling ventilator or well functioning air conditioning. Little kitchenette well equipped with stove and regular sized fridge. Green and peaceful environment very close to the lively historic town. You are inside the Kibbuz and get an idea about its life today, Amir is happy to share who it works today. Definitely  I will there again when in the area.
Thank you Amir and Sharon, we had a wonderful time staying at your great studio. We've enjoyed so much our stay that we will keep your address for our next trip to Akko.
A great place near ACres , very clean and freindly , highly recommend !!!!

Thanks Amir!  It was great spending my visit at your place.  Everything was very easy.  there was a nearby shop and cage in walking distance.  And walking distance to the bahai Gardens;  closer than (Hidden by Airbnb) maps reported  - basically across the street :)  The apartment was comfortable, good bed and we loved the terrace.  Thanks for everything.  Jennifer
We enjoyed our stay very much and the warm hospitality. We received fresh herbs to make tea and the atelier feel to our room was very unique.
Amir was a great host, communicative and nice. The apartment is clean and cozy. Great for a romantic weekend..

What a great place to stay for visiting the Ancient and Modern city of Acre. Amir and his wife Sharon made our trip fantastic even organizing the best place in Acre for dinner with limited waiting time at a packed restaurant. Thanks again guys!

The apartment is located in a nice and quiet Kibbutz near Akko. The apartmemt was clean and comfy and it has a big rooftop only for the guests to use. Communication with Amir was easy and fast. I defenitely recommend this place
Nice friendly Kibbutz. You need your own transport  to stay here. Hosts very helpful.

We spend 3 wonderful nights in Sharon and Amir's house. Thank you so much. We loved the design of the apartment and felt home away from home.
With special thanks to the Shomrat treats! All the best!!!

Perfect location if you want to explore the north of Israel by car (Haifa, Akko, Nazareth, Tiberias, Rosh Hanikra, etc.).
Great and super-friendly hosts. Clean and cosy apartment.

Absolutely recommendable!

Absolutely lovely family and lovely apartment. A real treat for our girls as right next to a little playground. Lots of very friendly dogs who are out and about, which we loved. A real treat for us as very near a gorgeous restaurant.  And the offer of herbs for tea was such a delight as I arrived with a funny tummy but it was better within minutes of the tea. So was fully able to enjoy the food nearby.

Great location, the place is extra clean, nicely decorated and super relaxing with a great roof including hammocks. The kibbutz is amazing, very quiet and peaceful. Amir was really helpful all along the way. We had an amazing breakfast at a goat cheese restaurant, one minute from the appartment. Very close to Akko too. I will come back for sure !

Amir's studio was great, we had a really good time.
Everything was as promised and even better.
Amir was very available when we needed him.
We highly recommend Amir's studio!
Amir's place is beautiful, pleasent and cozy! we had a great time and recommand the place for everyone!

it's our second stay, and needless to say that it won't be the last.
Sharon&Amir are the best hosts you can ask for.
they welcome you with a big smile and , fresh tea herbs,and clean place. they let you know that they are there for you at your stay.

it's the perfect getaway for us.
warm reccommendations.
Was in contact with me many times.

Amir could not be present to welcome us, being himself invited for the jewish new year festivities, but he explained exactly by mail how to reach the studio.
He made sure we felt OK by calling us on our mobile and asked us not to hesitate for any further question.
He did not have to tell us about things to see because we used his place as a stopover on our way to a cousin in the vicinity.
In conclusion we enjoyed very much our stay and would recommend it.
Excellent value for your money.

We had a short but lovely stay at the studio, which has a lovely terasse and hammock to relax in. The kibbutz is lovely and you can have very nice gourmet breakfast there, with fantastic local goat cheese. Great place to stay for an overnight Akko trip!

The Studio Amir and Sharon rent is super nice with an impressive terrace that invites you to stay there. The bed was very comfortable. Sharon brought us herbs from the garden to make fresh tea and Amir explained us where the best places are to find. I can recommend the apartment very much. Thanks for having us.
We stayed for 1 night and we were very satisfied. The room was clean and also well equipped. There is a also nice hammock in the balcony.
Nice small isolated room.

לצערי הגענו ממש מאוחר ובהתראה של יום אז הפעם!!! לא נפגשנו עם אמיר ואשתו שרון
אין לי ספק שתהיה פעם הבאה.
הופתענו ושמחנו לראות את היצירות של שרון המאד מוכשרת ואשמח גם להכיר אותה.
הסביבה נהדרת והצימר פשוט תענוג
תודה!!!

A delightfull jewerl and lovely hosts, welcoming and extremely helpfull especially in guiding us in the next stage of our journey. It is a pity we could not have stayed longer. Thank for your hospitality.

What a wonderful place! Specious, airy, fully private, well organized, well equipted, nicely decorated, and above all - so peaceful and realaxing. I could use the whole roof, with the comfi hammock and sitting area. A great cafe-restaurant is just a few steps away, Acre and Nahariya are a few minutes driving and many other places in the north are reachable within short drives.
Communication with Amir and Sharon was fluent, clear and easygoing. I could stay for one night only but certainly will come back to their bright and peaceful studio apartment.
Super spacious studio with everthing you need. Nice kibbuz area with fabulous goat cheese. Amir is very friendly and helpful. Thank you!

Amir was not at home on my arrival time, but he called me and had explain me all details incl. the way to his house. what a awesome service. the place is beautiful and peaceful. If you can, go there and enjoy it

If you are looking for a place where you can totally switch off and recharge your batteries but also would like to travel around this is the place to be. The accommodation is very tidy and cosy with a homy feeling. Sharon and Amir are very welcoming hosts. They are always there to help if it's needed. We had a great time there. Thank you :)
Suzan&Silva

If you are looking for a cozy and calm place but with short ways to both, the cities and beaches nearby and the highway towards the Sea of Galilee/Golan Heights this might be your place to stay!

Amir and his lovely family are thoughtful and helpful in every way, e.g. not only recommending great hiking places in the Golan Heights, but taking the time to explain possible trails on detailed hiking maps they provided.

The studio itself is located on the first floor of their beautiful house in the middle of a quiet and calm Kibbuz (free and safe parking is possible nearby). It is equipped with basic kitchen utensils, a comfortable bed for two and a nice bathroom. In addition one might find the hammock and terrace area nice from where to overlook the neighbourhood.

We had two great days at Amir's place and can only recommend to stay there!
Nice and clean apartment with a great host!
The place was clean and nice and cozy. Amir is a great host and he is always available. It was pleasure to stay in this apartment !

A nice neighbourhood, the house was tidy and cozy. Good location to explore Akko!
Amir was helpful even though he was on a holiday himself. Gave some good advice for restaurants, etc.
There was a problem with the WIFI but that's usually not the case and he tried to help as much as possible.

we had a wonderful time.
the studio has everything you need for a lovely stay.
amir &sharon are very kind , helpfull, and all is with a smile and good will.
perfect get away.

Amir went out of his way to coach us in and make us feel at home. It is a terrific, well equipped and clean appartment with a great view and lots of privacy and space. After a long day, it was quit relaxing to sit on the palm branch covered roof with a cold beer. After our arrival, Amir and his family went away for Shabbat and trusted us with the house. We did not see them again, because we left early the next morning. Kibbutz Shomrat is a perfect location for those traveling the Western Galilee. Certainly recommanded!

Very nice relaxing,clean and quite place with a personnel atmosphere.
Amir and Sharon are very nice and friendly.
Good start to visit Akko and the surrounded area. Hot shower, well equipped kitchen, private entrance, comfortable bed.
Would love to stay there again..thank you

A big welcoming smile on arrival. Gorgeous accomodation. Private and peaceful. Would love to go back :)
Thankyou Amir

Amir was very nice and available whenever we needed something, from the day before we arrived until we left. We had some kids noise in the morning, but it wasn't too soon and nothing we suffered from. Bottom line - great value for money and a 'Kibbutz'-like weekend
Very friendly welcome. Interesting kibbutz atmosphere. Large and clean room.

It was a really nice stay at Amir's and Sharon's place. We enjoyed the studio that is fully equipped for cooking and it's so quiet at night. Sharon cut some herbs from her garden for tea and it had an amazing fresh taste. Thanks a lot for everything.

The studio I stayed was very comfortable,private, spacious,full of art.Amir answer every my questions about transportion few month before my trip .That day I came Akko was Friday ,Amir is not at home,but he texted me before and after my trip to taken care of me. At first,I get off at the wrong stop,and Amir let his friends Guy to picked me up and take me to the studio .
Highly recommended!

I stayed here for one night over Rosh Hashanah while visiting Rosh Hanikra and Akko. The description and photos were accurate. The studio is in a great location - close to Akko but on a very peaceful, beautiful kibbutz. The apartment is decorated with artwork, has natural light (but also a screen in case you want to sleep in and don't want the sun), a large terrace with a comfortable hammock and table, TV, wifi, AC, hot water. I didn't meet the host in person as he was away that day but he was very accommodating in making sure we had everything we needed and answered quickly when I had a question about the wifi password. The space is perfect for a single or couple and could probably accommodate a child as well. There is plenty of parking right in front of the apartment if you are driving.

As others have mentioned, the only potential downside is that there is no kitchen. Since we only stayed one night we didn't really need a kitchen although having a mini-fridge and waste bin would have been convenient though not essential.

we had lovley time at amir and sharon, the room is beautifly decorated
private and Comfortable.and the hosts were caring, welcoming,and gave us a lot of good tips abaut enjoing the area. we will come back...

The studio is a very cozy place to just hang out or to start out to trips to very near by Akko or to Haifa. We loved it right from the spot and communication with Amir was fantastic! We asked for the studio the same day and immediately got a positive answer. The terrace is beautiful and the room its very clean and with a great and personnel atmosphere. The only thing that might be missing is a small fridge.

מומלץ לחנות מחוץ לשער הפנימי של הקיבוץ (הכוונה לא הראשי). זה מרחק 2 דקות הליכה מהדירה וכך לא צריך לבקש שיפתחו את השער בכל פעם שרוצים לצאת/להיכנס עם האוטו.

הדירה מקסימה ממש, יש בה כל מה שהיה צריך, והיה כיף לשבת במרפסת לראות את הנוף!
ממליצה בחום!
מקום פשוט,שקט ונחמד
בילינו לילה אחד, לשנות אוירה ולבקר בגליל המערבי היפיפה והיה פשוט תענוג. קרוב לטבע, לביקור בעכו או נהריה ובלב הקיבוץ הנעים. מומלץ בהחלט!

סטודיו מקסים, צ'קאין ואאוט סופר נוח והבעלים זמין ונחמד.
בערב אפילו קיבלנו המלצה איפה לטייל בקיבוץ.
מומלץ!

היה בדיוק כמו שתואר.
נקי, ואחלה של מרפסת.

הסטודיו מעל הבית באווירה כיפית, שקטה של הקיבוץ.

זה יחידה על הגג עם כניסה נפרדת. שקט לגמרי, לא ראינו או שמענו אף אחד. מיטה נוחה, מזגן טוב, דוד שמש . יש פינת ישיבה במרפסת ענקית, מעט מאובק ומלוכלך מהענבים שנופלים מהגג :) אבל יש לזה קסם.. עמיר עזר לנו להוריד אפליקציה שפתחה את השער הפנימי בקיבוץ. את השער החיצוני הלילה עמיר פתח לי כששלחתי לו וואטסאפ (הגיב מהר מאוד). הכל היה נקי ומסודר. מעט הופתענו שלא היה שמפו ותחליב רחצה. משחת שיניים וטואלטיקה נוספת ומגבות היה . בקיצור היה לנו מצויין וממליצים בחום.

נהנינו מאוד בתוספת ההמלצות של אמיר לאיזור!

reviews.comments: Das Studio im Obergeschoss mit Terasse  ist geräumig, interessant und liebevoll eingerichtet und sehr sauber. Das Kibbuz bot uns interessante Eindrücke über das Leben in Israel, die die Eindrücke aus den Metropolen ergänzen. Amir und Sharon haben uns herzlich empfangen und hatten uns bereits im Voraus mit wertvollen Tipps und Infos versorgt.  Die Unterkunft ist ein super Ausgangspunkt für Exkursionen in Galiläa, man ist aber auf ein Auto angewiesen. Der Jom Kippurtag (kein Autoverkehr) verschaffte uns einige Stunden entspannter Muße in der Hängematte und einen langen Spaziergang nach Akko.
דירה נחמדה מאד. בחוץ יש מרפסת (על גג) חמודה עם ערסל וגפן

נעהדירה הייתה בקומה השניה והיה נעים מאוד לשבת במרפסת שלה תחת הגפן.

L'endroit est charmant. Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Amir et sa femme. Le studio est propre et fonctionnel avec une touche de décoration. La terrasse privative est très agréable pour le petit déjeuner. Je conseille fortement pour aller visiter Acre.
המקום נקי ואווירה נעימה, אמיר ענה לנו על כל שאלה. מומלץ בחום!
Amir und Sharon sind supernette Gastgeber! Es fehlte uns an nichts. Ein sehr guter Ausgangspunkt um den Norden von Israel zu erkunden!
מומלץ מאוד למי שמחפש מקום נחמד ושקט בצפון, הדירה מהממת והמארחים מאוד נחמדים וגם יש אחלה מסעדה בתוך הקיבוץ.  נהננו ממש!

Wir waren nur 2 Nächte bei Amir, aber es hat uns gut gefallen. Amir war super flexibel bei unserer doch erheblich verspäteten Anreise und konnte uns noch Tipps geben, um spät am Abend was zu essen zu bekommen. Das Appartment ist gut ausgestattet, es stand sogar löslicher Kaffee bereit. Man ist mit dem Auto sehr schnell in Akko. Wir kommen gerne wieder.

דירת סטודיו נעימה ומתוקה! נקייה ומוארת היטב, מאובזרת בכל מה שצריך, החל מכלי מטבח ועד מגבות ומיזוג. יש מרפסת ענקית ופינת ישיבה כיפית (אפילו ערסל שאפשר לרבוץ בו). עמיר קיבל את פנינו לפני שעת הצ'ק אין בגלל שהגענו עם תינוקת, וסידר מזרן נוסף בשבילה - ובאופן כללי היה ממש נחמד ודאג להיות זמין לכל שאלה ועזרה. בונוס מדהים היה הבריכה של הקיבוץ שהייתה פתוחה ועזרה להפיג את החום הנורא.
reviews.response: היה כייף לארח אתכם. בשמחה תמיד

reviews.comments:
Fijne locatie.
We waren met de huurauto heel snel in Akko.
Alles wat we nodig hadden was aanwezig.
Heel mooi dakterras!

Je recommande vivement cette adresse ! Amir et Sharon sont adorables et très prévenants. Le studio est propre, hyper fonctionnel et vraiment bien situé près d'Akko. Une très belle adresse. Les photos ne mettent pas en valeur comme le studio est bien décoré (de jolis tableaux peints). Bravo !

Wir hatten einen tollen und entspannten Aufenthalt in der Wohnung von Sharon & Amir. Die Wohnung ist gemütlich eingerichtet und hat eine ganz tolle Dachterrasse. Hier konnten wir eine schöne Zeit mit unserer kleinen Tochter verbringen. Die Stadt Akko und der Strand sind mit dem Auto schnell zu erreichen. In der Umgebung gibt zwei gute Restaurants ganz in der Nähe. Wir fühlten uns sehr wohl und kommen gerne wieder!

Shomrat liegt verkehrsgünstig in der Nähe von Akko allerdings hört man den Verkehr auch...
Die Terasse ist nett, einkaufen kann man um die Ecke.
reviews.response:
Thanks Judith for your feedback,

Amir

reviews.comments: Studio très propre. Super terrasse. Proximité dAkko. A recommander.
Sehr schöne ruhige Unterkunft und überaus hilfsbereite, nette Gastgeber. Die Lage eignet sich gut um den Norden Israels zu erkunden. Empfehlenswert!

Sehr schöne Wohnung in einem Kibbutz in der Nähe von Akko. Besonders gefallen hat uns die Terrasse und die Ausstattung der Wohnung mit Gemälden. Unbedingt probieren: Das georgische Restaurant in der direkten Nachbarschaft und als besonderes Highlight ein Besuch bei Uri Buri in der Altstadt von Akko.

Inmitten eines Kibuzz, etwas abseits gelegen, aber mit sehr guter Verkehrsanbindung an Akko. Die Gastgeber waren ausgesprochen nette Menschen, zu denen wir sofort einen guten Kontakt herstellen konnten und mit denen wir einen interessanten Gedankenaustausch hatten.

Appartement très propre et agréable.
Amir a été disponible et à l'écoute.
Bonne expérience
Je recommande le logement d'amir !

Très contente de mon séjour ! La petite ville de Akko est un incontournable d'Israel. La maison est à 5 minutes en voiture avec toute la tranquillité, l'espace et la nature dont on aurait besoin.
Amir nous a accueilli avec beaucoup de sympathie et de conseils pour notre voyage. La maison est très propre et neuve.

Thank you :)

Very happy with my stay! The small town of Akko Israel is a must. The house is 5 minutes drive with all the tranquility, space and nature that would be needed.
Amir welcomed us with great sympathy and advice for our trip. The house is very clean and new.

Thank you :)

Vi havde 3 dejlige dage hos Amir og Sharon. De er venlige, omsorgsfulde og hjælpsomme. Der var også små overraskelser: en stor buket friske urter til te og en morgen stod der friskbagt brød med avokado, te og oliven ved døren.
Terrassen var perfekt med både sol og skygge og værelset hyggeligt med Sharons egne malerier.
Hyggeligt med det lille supermarked og fantastisk morgenmad på Alto.

description: בואו לחוות דרך חיים אקולוגית! לכבוד הקיץ הוספנו בריכת אינטקס קטנה( בתמונות)* יש מזגן בחדר המרכזי הפועל בשעות הכי חמות 11:00-15:00*הבית שלנו ממוקם ביישוב קטן על צלע גבעה, הנקרא "אדמה".ובנוי מחומרים טבעיים , בהמון אהבה.עם השנים עברו בבית זה הרבה מטיילים ואנשים שחפצה נפשם במקום שקט להתחבר בו לעצמם ולטבע.חלל הבית מאפשר אירוח של עד כעשרה אנשים ומתאים לזוגות, משפחות, סדנאות, ויחידים, המחוברים לטבע הפראי ויכולים ליהנות משהות במקום אלטרנטיבי.The spaceהחלל מורכב מדום  גדול, חדר בוץ, מטבח, בקתה קטנה כיחידה נפרדת וחדר אמבטיה.לבית חשמל סולרי ומערכת המאפשרת מחזור של שאריות האוכל ליצירת גז בישול,השירותים פועלים על מים וגם מייצרים גז בישולבמקלחת ובכיורים אנו משתמשים בסבונים טבעיים כדי לשמור על הסביבה .במטבח מקרר גדול, לבית גינת ירק ומקום למדורה.---זהו מקום טוב להירגע בו, לתרגל יוגה, למדוט, לנגן מוזיקה ולהיות עם אנשים אהובים או לבלות זמן איכות עם עצמך.***אין אפשרות להכניס או לבשל בשר או דגים בבית שלנו או ברחבי הכפר***הנחל הקרוב -נחל כזיב נמצא עשר דק' נסיעה מהבית. חוף הים הקרוב נמצא כשלושים דקות נסיעה מהבית בעיר נהריה בה תמצאו גם סופרמרקט, מסעדות וחנויות.עשר דקות מהבית נמצאת גינה אורגנית וחנות קטנה עם תוצרת מקומית.אפשר להתנייד באיזור באוטו או בטרמפים.מתאים לאנשים שאוהבים אורח חיים טבעי, לא מתאים למי שמחפש צימר מפונפן ...תמיד נשקיע להכין ולנקות מכל הלב ...וזה הבית שלנו, הוא פראי.  למגיעים להתארח בבית ורוצים להעמיק את החוויה , ניתן לבחור לעבור סדנאות של בישול טבעוני, בנייה טבעית, גינון ויצירת גינה, שיעורים ליצירת אורח חיים בריא, שיעורי קול ומוזיקה, ופגישות ייעוץ להגשמה אישית ומקצועית.מחכים לכם,ברק ועדי לב

בית מיוחד ומעניין בישוב אדמה, לא שגרתי אך בהחלט מאובזר ע"פ אורח החיים המיוחד. אנחנו עם 5 ילדים והבית היה מספיק מרווח עבורנו. התחברנו למקום והיה לנו טוב וכך גם הילדים. אהבנו לשבת בחוץ ליד מדורה בערבים ולהנות מהטבע מסביב ובתוך הבית. למרות שהיינו בשבוע חם באוגוסט הבית היה נעים וגם הבריכה הקטנה בחוץ היתה צ'ופר מצוין. אהבתי במיוחד את חדר הרחצה מול הטבע .
עדי וברק היו מסבירי פנים והשקיעו הרבה בצ'ק אין פנים אל פנים כדי שנרגיש בנח בבית. אירחו אותנו ברוחב לב וממש העמידו את כל הבית לרשותנו.
בית קסום ואקולוגי בטבע, חוויה!

בית מיוחד וקרוב לטבע עם פינת גינה קטנה וקסומה, מקלחת עם נוף מרתק ומארחים נעימים וזמינים מאוד לשאלות ועזרה.

המזגן רק בחדר המרכזי בין 11 ל 15, אין אפשרות לשחק עם השעות.
